OpenTHUG  0.1.0
OpenTHUG: let's port THUG on Linux

Перечисления

enum  eParticleType {
  PARTICLE_TYPE_LINE, PARTICLE_TYPE_FLAT, PARTICLE_TYPE_SHADED, PARTICLE_TYPE_SMOOTH,
  PARTICLE_TYPE_GLOW, PARTICLE_TYPE_STAR, PARTICLE_TYPE_SMOOTHSTAR, PARTICLE_TYPE_RIBBON,
  PARTICLE_TYPE_SMOOTHRIBBON, PARTICLE_TYPE_RIBBONTRAIL, PARTICLE_TYPE_GLOWRIBBONTRAIL
}
 
enum  BlendModes {
  vBLEND_MODE_DIFFUSE, vBLEND_MODE_ADD, vBLEND_MODE_ADD_FIXED, vBLEND_MODE_SUBTRACT,
  vBLEND_MODE_SUB_FIXED, vBLEND_MODE_BLEND, vBLEND_MODE_BLEND_FIXED, vBLEND_MODE_MODULATE,
  vBLEND_MODE_MODULATE_FIXED, vBLEND_MODE_BRIGHTEN, vBLEND_MODE_BRIGHTEN_FIXED, vBLEND_MODE_GLOSS_MAP,
  vBLEND_MODE_BLEND_PREVIOUS_MASK, vBLEND_MODE_BLEND_INVERSE_PREVIOUS_MASK, vBLEND_MODE_MODULATE_COLOR = 15, vBLEND_MODE_ONE_INV_SRC_ALPHA = 17,
  vNUM_BLEND_MODES
}
 
enum  SceneRenderFlags {
  vRENDER_OPAQUE = 1, vRENDER_SEMITRANSPARENT = 2, vRENDER_OCCLUDED = 4, vRENDER_NO_CULLING = 8,
  vRENDER_SORT_FRONT_TO_BACK = 16, vRENDER_SHADOW_VOLUMES = 32, vRENDER_BILLBOARDS = 64, vRENDER_INSTANCE_PRE_WORLD_SEMITRANSPARENT = 128,
  vRENDER_INSTANCE_POST_WORLD_SEMITRANSPARENT = 256
}

◆ eParticleType

enum NxXbox::eParticleType
Элементы перечислений
PARTICLE_TYPE_LINE 
PARTICLE_TYPE_FLAT 
PARTICLE_TYPE_SHADED 
PARTICLE_TYPE_SMOOTH 
PARTICLE_TYPE_GLOW 
PARTICLE_TYPE_STAR 
PARTICLE_TYPE_SMOOTHSTAR

PARTICLE_TYPE_SMOOTHRIBBON 
PARTICLE_TYPE_RIBBONTRAIL 
PARTICLE_TYPE_GLOWRIBBONTRAIL

◆ BlendModes

enum NxXbox::BlendModes
Элементы перечислений
vBLEND_MODE_DIFFUSE 
vBLEND_MODE_ADD 
vBLEND_MODE_ADD_FIXED 
vBLEND_MODE_SUBTRACT 
vBLEND_MODE_SUB_FIXED 
vBLEND_MODE_BLEND 
vBLEND_MODE_BLEND_FIXED 
vBLEND_MODE_MODULATE 
vBLEND_MODE_MODULATE_FIXED 
vBLEND_MODE_BRIGHTEN 
vBLEND_MODE_BRIGHTEN_FIXED 
vBLEND_MODE_GLOSS_MAP 
vBLEND_MODE_BLEND_PREVIOUS_MASK 
vBLEND_MODE_BLEND_INVERSE_PREVIOUS_MASK 
vBLEND_MODE_MODULATE_COLOR 
vBLEND_MODE_ONE_INV_SRC_ALPHA 
vNUM_BLEND_MODES 

См. определение в файле render.h строка 64

65  {
66  vBLEND_MODE_DIFFUSE, // ( 0 - 0 ) * 0 + Src
67  vBLEND_MODE_ADD, // ( Src - 0 ) * Src + Dst
68  vBLEND_MODE_ADD_FIXED, // ( Src - 0 ) * Fixed + Dst
69  vBLEND_MODE_SUBTRACT, // ( 0 - Src ) * Src + Dst
70  vBLEND_MODE_SUB_FIXED, // ( 0 - Src ) * Fixed + Dst
71  vBLEND_MODE_BLEND, // ( Src * Dst ) * Src + Dst
72  vBLEND_MODE_BLEND_FIXED, // ( Src * Dst ) * Fixed + Dst
73  vBLEND_MODE_MODULATE, // ( Dst - 0 ) * Src + 0
74  vBLEND_MODE_MODULATE_FIXED, // ( Dst - 0 ) * Fixed + 0
75  vBLEND_MODE_BRIGHTEN, // ( Dst - 0 ) * Src + Dst
76  vBLEND_MODE_BRIGHTEN_FIXED, // ( Dst - 0 ) * Fixed + Dst
77  vBLEND_MODE_GLOSS_MAP, // Specular = Specular * Src - special mode for gloss mapping
78  vBLEND_MODE_BLEND_PREVIOUS_MASK, // ( Src - Dst ) * Dst + Dst
79  vBLEND_MODE_BLEND_INVERSE_PREVIOUS_MASK, // ( Dst - Src ) * Dst + Src
80 
81  vBLEND_MODE_MODULATE_COLOR = 15, // ( Dst - 0 ) * Src(col) + 0 - special mode for the shadow.
82  vBLEND_MODE_ONE_INV_SRC_ALPHA = 17, // - special mode for imposter rendering.
83 
84  vNUM_BLEND_MODES
85  } BlendModes;

◆ SceneRenderFlags

enum NxXbox::SceneRenderFlags
Элементы перечислений
vRENDER_OPAQUE 
vRENDER_SEMITRANSPARENT 
vRENDER_OCCLUDED 
vRENDER_NO_CULLING 
vRENDER_SORT_FRONT_TO_BACK 
vRENDER_SHADOW_VOLUMES 
vRENDER_BILLBOARDS 
vRENDER_INSTANCE_PRE_WORLD_SEMITRANSPARENT 
vRENDER_INSTANCE_POST_WORLD_SEMITRANSPARENT 

См. определение в файле render.h строка 87

88  {
89  vRENDER_OPAQUE = 1,
90  vRENDER_SEMITRANSPARENT = 2,
91  vRENDER_OCCLUDED = 4,
92  vRENDER_NO_CULLING = 8, // Used for instances which have already been culled at a higher level
93  vRENDER_SORT_FRONT_TO_BACK = 16, // Used to improve pixel rejection tests for opaque rendering only
94  vRENDER_SHADOW_VOLUMES = 32, // Used to indicate that only shadow volumes should be (special-case) rendered
95  vRENDER_BILLBOARDS = 64, // Used to indicate that billboards should be rendered
96  vRENDER_INSTANCE_PRE_WORLD_SEMITRANSPARENT = 128, // Used to indicate that this instance rendering is happening prior to semitransparent world rendering
97  vRENDER_INSTANCE_POST_WORLD_SEMITRANSPARENT = 256, // Used to indicate that this instance rendering is happening after semitransparent world rendering
98  } SceneRenderFlags;

Функции

◆ GetVertexShader()

DWORD NxXbox::GetVertexShader ( bool  vertex_colors,
bool  specular,
uint32  max_weights_used 
)

См. определение в файле anim.cpp строка 122

123 {
124  Dbg_Assert( max_weights_used > 0 );
125 
126  if( vertex_colors )
127  {
128  if( max_weights_used == 1 )
129  {
130  return ( specular ) ? WeightedMeshVS_VXC_Specular_1Weight : WeightedMeshVS_VXC_1Weight;
131  }
132  else if( max_weights_used == 2 )
133  {
134  return ( specular ) ? WeightedMeshVS_VXC_Specular_2Weight : WeightedMeshVS_VXC_2Weight;
135  }
136  else if( max_weights_used == 3 )
137  {
138  return ( specular ) ? WeightedMeshVS_VXC_Specular_3Weight : WeightedMeshVS_VXC_3Weight;
139  }
140  }
141 
142  Dbg_Assert( 0 );
143  return 0;
144 }

Перекрестные ссылки WeightedMeshVS_VXC_1Weight, WeightedMeshVS_VXC_2Weight, WeightedMeshVS_VXC_3Weight, WeightedMeshVS_VXC_Specular_1Weight, WeightedMeshVS_VXC_Specular_2Weight и WeightedMeshVS_VXC_Specular_3Weight.

Используется в NxXbox::sMesh::Initialize().

Граф вызова функции:

◆ CreateWeightedMeshVertexShaders()

void NxXbox::CreateWeightedMeshVertexShaders ( void  )

См. определение в файле anim.cpp строка 152

153 {
154  static bool created_shaders = false;
155 
156  if( !created_shaders )
157  {
158  created_shaders = true;
159 
160  if( D3D_OK != D3DDevice_CreateVertexShader( WeightedMeshVertexShaderVertColUV4Decl,
161  dwWeightedMeshVS_VXC_1WeightVertexShader, // Defined in the header file from xsasm.
162  &WeightedMeshVS_VXC_1Weight,
163  0 ))
164  {
165  exit( 0 );
166  }
167  if( D3D_OK != D3DDevice_CreateVertexShader( WeightedMeshVertexShaderVertColUV4Decl,
168  dwWeightedMeshVS_VXC_2WeightVertexShader, // Defined in the header file from xsasm.
169  &WeightedMeshVS_VXC_2Weight,
170  0 ))
171  {
172  exit( 0 );
173  }
174  if( D3D_OK != D3DDevice_CreateVertexShader( WeightedMeshVertexShaderVertColUV4Decl,
175  dwWeightedMeshVS_VXC_3WeightVertexShader, // Defined in the header file from xsasm.
176  &WeightedMeshVS_VXC_3Weight,
177  0 ))
178  {
179  exit( 0 );
180  }
181 
182  if( D3D_OK != D3DDevice_CreateVertexShader( WeightedMeshVertexShaderVertColUV4Decl,
183  dwWeightedMeshVS_VXC_Specular_1WeightVertexShader, // Defined in the header file from xsasm.
184  &WeightedMeshVS_VXC_Specular_1Weight,
185  0 ))
186  {
187  exit( 0 );
188  }
189  if( D3D_OK != D3DDevice_CreateVertexShader( WeightedMeshVertexShaderVertColUV4Decl,
190  dwWeightedMeshVS_VXC_Specular_2WeightVertexShader, // Defined in the header file from xsasm.
191  &WeightedMeshVS_VXC_Specular_2Weight,
192  0 ))
193  {
194  exit( 0 );
195  }
196  if( D3D_OK != D3DDevice_CreateVertexShader( WeightedMeshVertexShaderVertColUV4Decl,
197  dwWeightedMeshVS_VXC_Specular_3WeightVertexShader, // Defined in the header file from xsasm.
198  &WeightedMeshVS_VXC_Specular_3Weight,
199  0 ))
200  {
201  exit( 0 );
202  }
203 
204  if( D3D_OK != D3DDevice_CreateVertexShader( WeightedMeshVertexShaderVertColUV4Decl,
205  dwWeightedMeshVS_VXC_1Weight_UVTransformVertexShader, // Defined in the header file from xsasm.
206  &WeightedMeshVS_VXC_1Weight_UVTransform,
207  0 ))
208  {
209  exit( 0 );
210  }
211

214  &WeightedMeshVS_VXC_2Weight_UVTransform,
215  0 ))
216  {
217  exit( 0 );
218  }
219 
220  if( D3D_OK != D3DDevice_CreateVertexShader( WeightedMeshVertexShaderVertColUV4Decl,
221  dwWeightedMeshVS_VXC_3Weight_UVTransformVertexShader, // Defined in the header file from xsasm.
222  &WeightedMeshVS_VXC_3Weight_UVTransform,
223  0 ))
224  {
225  exit( 0 );
226  }
227 
228  if( D3D_OK != D3DDevice_CreateVertexShader( WeightedMeshVertexShaderVertColUV4Decl,
229  dwWeightedMeshVertexShader_SBWriteVertexShader, // Defined in the header file from xsasm.
230  &WeightedMeshVertexShader_SBWrite,
231  0 ))
232  {
233  exit( 0 );
234  }
235

247  0 ))

250  }

295  0 ))
296  {
297  exit( 0 );
298  }
299  }
300 }

Перекрестные ссылки BillboardScreenAlignedVS, BillboardVSDecl, NewParticleFlatVSDecl, ParticleFlatVS, ParticleFlatVSDecl, ParticleNewFlatPointSpriteVS, ParticleNewFlatVS, ShadowBufferStaticGeomVS, ShadowBufferStaticGeomVSDecl, WeightedMeshVertexShader_SBWrite, WeightedMeshVertexShaderVertColUV4Decl, WeightedMeshVS_VXC_1Weight, WeightedMeshVS_VXC_1Weight_SBPassThru, WeightedMeshVS_VXC_1Weight_UVTransform, WeightedMeshVS_VXC_2Weight, WeightedMeshVS_VXC_2Weight_SBPassThru, WeightedMeshVS_VXC_2Weight_UVTransform, WeightedMeshVS_VXC_3Weight, WeightedMeshVS_VXC_3Weight_SBPassThru, WeightedMeshVS_VXC_3Weight_UVTransform, WeightedMeshVS_VXC_Specular_1Weight, WeightedMeshVS_VXC_Specular_2Weight и WeightedMeshVS_VXC_Specular_3Weight.

Используется в InitialiseRenderstates().

Граф вызова функции:

◆ setup_weighted_mesh_vertex_shader()

void NxXbox::setup_weighted_mesh_vertex_shader ( void *  p_root_matrix,
void *  p_bone_matrices,
int  num_bone_matrices 
)

См. определение в файле anim.cpp строка 308

309 {
310  XGMATRIX dest_matrix;
311  XGMATRIX inverse_view_matrix;
312  XGMATRIX temp_matrix;
313  XGMATRIX projMatrix;
314  XGMATRIX viewMatrix;
315  XGMATRIX worldMatrix;
316 
317  // Projection matrix.
318  XGMatrixTranspose( &projMatrix, &EngineGlobals.projection_matrix );
319 
320  // View matrix.
321  XGMatrixTranspose( &viewMatrix, &EngineGlobals.view_matrix );
322  viewMatrix.m[3][0] = 0.0f;
323  viewMatrix.m[3][1] = 0.0f;
324  viewMatrix.m[3][2] = 0.0f;
325  viewMatrix.m[3][3] = 1.0f;
326 
327  // World space transformation matrix. (3x3 rotation plus 3 element translation component).
328  worldMatrix.m[0][0] = ((float*)p_root_matrix )[0];
329  worldMatrix.m[0][1] = ((float*)p_root_matrix )[1];
330  worldMatrix.m[0][2] = ((float*)p_root_matrix )[2];
331  worldMatrix.m[0][3] = ((float*)p_root_matrix )[3];
332  worldMatrix.m[1][0] = ((float*)p_root_matrix )[4];
333  worldMatrix.m[1][1] = ((float*)p_root_matrix )[5];
334  worldMatrix.m[1][2] = ((float*)p_root_matrix )[6];
335  worldMatrix.m[1][3] = ((float*)p_root_matrix )[7];
336  worldMatrix.m[2][0] = ((float*)p_root_matrix )[8];
337  worldMatrix.m[2][1] = ((float*)p_root_matrix )[9];
338  worldMatrix.m[2][2] = ((float*)p_root_matrix )[10];
339  worldMatrix.m[2][3] = ((float*)p_root_matrix )[11];
340  worldMatrix.m[3][0] = 0.0f;
341  worldMatrix.m[3][1] = 0.0f;
342  worldMatrix.m[3][2] = 0.0f;
343  worldMatrix.m[3][3] = 1.0f;
344 
345  // Calculate composite world->view->projection matrix.
346  XGMatrixMultiply( &temp_matrix, &viewMatrix, &worldMatrix );
347  XGMatrixMultiply( &dest_matrix, &projMatrix, &temp_matrix );
348 
349  // Switch to 192 constant mode, removing the lock on the reserved constants c-38 and c-37.
350 // D3DDevice_SetShaderConstantMode( D3DSCM_192CONSTANTS | D3DSCM_NORESERVEDCONSTANTS );
351 
352  // Load up the combined world, camera & projection matrix.
353  D3DDevice_SetVertexShaderConstantFast( VSCONST_REG_TRANSFORM_OFFSET, (void*)&dest_matrix, VSCONST_REG_TRANSFORM_SIZE );
354  D3DDevice_SetVertexShaderConstantFast( VSCONST_REG_WORLD_TRANSFORM_OFFSET, (void*)&worldMatrix, VSCONST_REG_WORLD_TRANSFORM_SIZE );
355 
356  // We want to transform the light directions by the inverse of the world transform - this means we don't have to transform
357  // the normal by the world transform for every vertex in the vertex shader. However, the function D3DXVec3TransformNormal
358  // (used below) does the inverse transform for us, so need to actually figure the inverse...
359 // XGMATRIX inverse_world_transform = worldMatrix;
360 // D3DXMatrixInverse( &inverse_world_transform, NULL, &worldMatrix );
361 
362  float directional_light_color[24];
363  CopyMemory( directional_light_color, EngineGlobals.directional_light_color, sizeof( float ) * 24 );
364 
365  XGVec3TransformNormal((XGVECTOR3*)&directional_light_color[0], (XGVECTOR3*)&EngineGlobals.directional_light_color[0], &worldMatrix );
366  XGVec3TransformNormal((XGVECTOR3*)&directional_light_color[8], (XGVECTOR3*)&EngineGlobals.directional_light_color[8], &worldMatrix );
367  XGVec3TransformNormal((XGVECTOR3*)&directional_light_color[16], (XGVECTOR3*)&EngineGlobals.directional_light_color[16], &worldMatrix );
368 
369  XGVec3Normalize((XGVECTOR3*)&directional_light_color[0], (XGVECTOR3*)&directional_light_color[0] );
370  XGVec3Normalize((XGVECTOR3*)&directional_light_color[8], (XGVECTOR3*)&directional_light_color[8] );
371  XGVec3Normalize((XGVECTOR3*)&directional_light_color[16], (XGVECTOR3*)&directional_light_color[16] );
372 
373  // Load up the directional light data.
374  D3DDevice_SetVertexShaderConstantFast( VSCONST_REG_DIR_LIGHT_OFFSET, (void*)directional_light_color, 6 );
375 
376  // Load up the ambient light color.
377  D3DDevice_SetVertexShaderConstantFast( VSCONST_REG_AMB_LIGHT_OFFSET, (void*)EngineGlobals.ambient_light_color, 1 );
378 
379  // Calculate and load up the model-relative camera position.
380  EngineGlobals.model_relative_cam_position = XGVECTOR3( EngineGlobals.cam_position.x - worldMatrix.m[0][3],
381  EngineGlobals.cam_position.y - worldMatrix.m[1][3],
382  EngineGlobals.cam_position.z - worldMatrix.m[2][3] );
383  XGVec3TransformNormal( &EngineGlobals.model_relative_cam_position, &EngineGlobals.model_relative_cam_position, &worldMatrix );
384 
385  float specular_attribs[4] = { EngineGlobals.model_relative_cam_position.x,
386  EngineGlobals.model_relative_cam_position.y,
387  EngineGlobals.model_relative_cam_position.z,
388  0.0f };
389  D3DDevice_SetVertexShaderConstantFast( VSCONST_REG_CAM_POS_OFFSET, (void*)&specular_attribs, 1 );
390 
391  // Safety check here to limit number of bones to that available.
392  if( num_bone_matrices > 55 )
393  {
394  num_bone_matrices = 55;
395  }
396 
397  DWORD* p_bone_element = (DWORD*)p_bone_matrices;
398 
399  // Begin state block to set vertex shader constants for bone transforms.
400  DWORD *p_push;
401  EngineGlobals.p_Device->BeginState(( num_bone_matrices * ( 12 + 1 )) + 3, &p_push );
402 
403  // 1 here isn't the parameter for SET_TRANSFORM_CONSTANT_LOAD; rather, it's the number of dwords written to that register.
404  p_push[0] = D3DPUSH_ENCODE( D3DPUSH_SET_TRANSFORM_CONSTANT_LOAD, 1 );
405 
406  // Here is the actual parameter for SET_TRANSFORM_CONSTANT_LOAD. Always add 96 to the constant register.
407  p_push[1] = VSCONST_REG_MATRIX_OFFSET + 96;
408 
409  p_push += 2;
410 
411  while( num_bone_matrices > 0 )
412  {
413  // A 3x4 matrix is 12 dwords. You can encode a maximum of 32 dwords to D3DPUSH_SET_TRANSFORM_CONSTANT before needing another D3DPUSH_ENCODE.
414  p_push[0] = D3DPUSH_ENCODE( D3DPUSH_SET_TRANSFORM_CONSTANT, 12 );
415 
416  p_push[1] = p_bone_element[0];
417  p_push[2] = p_bone_element[4];
418  p_push[3] = p_bone_element[8];
419  p_push[4] = p_bone_element[12];
420 
421  p_push[5] = p_bone_element[1];
422  p_push[6] = p_bone_element[5];
423  p_push[7] = p_bone_element[9];
424  p_push[8] = p_bone_element[13];
425 
426  p_push[9] = p_bone_element[2];
427  p_push[10] = p_bone_element[6];
428  p_push[11] = p_bone_element[10];
429  p_push[12] = p_bone_element[14];
430 
431  --num_bone_matrices;
432 
433  p_bone_element += 16;
434  p_push += 13;
435  }
436 
437  EngineGlobals.p_Device->EndState( p_push );
438 
439  // Load up the replacement registers for c-38 and c-37
440  // The z value is 2^24 - to take 1.0f to the max z buffer value for a 24bit z buffer.
441  static float homogenous_to_screen_reg[8] = { 320.0f, -240.0f, 1.6777215e7f, 0.0f, 320.53125f, 240.53125f, 0.0f, 0.0f };
442 
443  if( EngineGlobals.is_orthographic )
444  {
445  homogenous_to_screen_reg[0] = 128.0f;
446  homogenous_to_screen_reg[1] = -128.0f;
447 
448  homogenous_to_screen_reg[2] = 1.6777215e7f;
449 
450  homogenous_to_screen_reg[4] = 128.53125f;
451  homogenous_to_screen_reg[5] = 128.53125f;
452  }
453  else
454  {
455  homogenous_to_screen_reg[0] = (float)EngineGlobals.viewport.Width * 0.5f;
456  homogenous_to_screen_reg[1] = (float)EngineGlobals.viewport.Height * -0.5f;
457 
458  homogenous_to_screen_reg[2] = ( EngineGlobals.zstencil_depth == 16 ) ? 65535.0f : 1.6777215e7f;
459 
460  homogenous_to_screen_reg[4] = (float)NxXbox::EngineGlobals.viewport.X + ((float)NxXbox::EngineGlobals.viewport.Width * 0.5f ) + 0.53125f;
461  homogenous_to_screen_reg[5] = (float)NxXbox::EngineGlobals.viewport.Y + ((float)NxXbox::EngineGlobals.viewport.Height * 0.5f ) + 0.53125f;
462  }
463 
464  D3DDevice_SetVertexShaderConstantFast( 94, (void*)homogenous_to_screen_reg, 2 );
465 }

Перекрестные ссылки NxXbox::sEngineGlobals::ambient_light_color, NxXbox::sEngineGlobals::cam_position, NxXbox::sEngineGlobals::directional_light_color, EngineGlobals, NxXbox::sEngineGlobals::is_orthographic, NxXbox::sEngineGlobals::model_relative_cam_position, NxXbox::sEngineGlobals::p_Device, NxXbox::sEngineGlobals::projection_matrix, NxXbox::sEngineGlobals::view_matrix, NxXbox::sEngineGlobals::viewport и NxXbox::sEngineGlobals::zstencil_depth.

Используется в NxXbox::CInstance::Render().

477

479  EngineGlobals.custom_pipeline_enabled = true;

◆ sort_batches_by_draw_order()

static int NxXbox::sort_batches_by_draw_order ( const void *  p1,
const void *  p2 
)
static

См. определение в файле billboard.cpp строка 34

35 {
36  sBillboardMaterialBatch *p_batch0 = *((sBillboardMaterialBatch**)p1 );
37  sBillboardMaterialBatch *p_batch1 = *((sBillboardMaterialBatch**)p2 );
38 
39  // Deal with NULL pointers first (caused by removing batches from the list).
40  if( p_batch0 == NULL )
41  {
42  if( p_batch1 == NULL )
43  {
44  return 0;
45  }
46  else
47  {
48  return 1;
49  }
50  }
51  else if( p_batch1 == NULL )
52  {
53  return -1;
54  }
55 
56  return p_batch0->GetDrawOrder() < p_batch1->GetDrawOrder() ? -1 : p_batch0->GetDrawOrder() > p_batch1->GetDrawOrder() ? 1 : 0;
57 }

Перекрестные ссылки NxXbox::sBillboardMaterialBatch::GetDrawOrder(), p1 и p2.

◆ generateSwizzleTable()

static void NxXbox::generateSwizzleTable ( void  )
static

См. определение в файле chars.cpp строка 91

92 {
93  if( !swizzle_table_generated )
94  {
95  for( uint32 i = 0, value = 0; i < 4096; i++ )
96  {
97  swizzle_table[i] = value;
98  value += 0x2AAAAAAB;
99  value &= 0x55555555;
100  }
101  swizzle_table_generated = true;
102  }
103 }

Граф вызова функции:

◆ SwizzleTexture()

void NxXbox::SwizzleTexture ( void *  dstBuffer,
void *  srcBuffer,
int  width,
int  height,
int32  depth,
int32  stride 
)

См. определение в файле chars.cpp строка 114

115 {
116  int32 tilesX, tilesY;
117  int32 tilesSizeX, tilesSizeY;
118  int32 tileSize;
119 
120  generateSwizzleTable();
121 
122  if( width > height )
123  {
124  tilesX = width / height;
125  tilesY = 1;
126 
127  tilesSizeX = width / tilesX;
128  tilesSizeY = height;
129  }
130  else
131  {
132  tilesX = 1;
133  tilesY = height / width;
134 
135  tilesSizeX = width;
136  tilesSizeY = height / tilesY;
137  }
138 
139  tileSize = tilesSizeX * tilesSizeY;
140 
141  switch (depth)
142  {
143  case 4:
144  case 8:
145  {
146  int32 j;
147 
148  for (j = 0; j < tilesY; j++)
149  {
150  int32 i;
151 
152  for (i = 0; i < tilesX; i++)
153  {
154  int32 y;
155  uint8 *base;
156 
157  base = (uint8 *)(((uint8 *)dstBuffer) +
158  ((tileSize * tilesX) * j) +
159  (tileSize * i));
160 
161  for (y = 0; y < tilesSizeY; y++)
162  {
163  uint8 *srcPixel;
164  int32 x;
165 
166  srcPixel = (uint8 *)(((uint8 *)srcBuffer) +
167  (stride * (tilesSizeY * j)) +
168  (tilesSizeX * i) +
169  (stride * y));
170 
171  for (x = 0; x < tilesSizeX; x++)
172  {
173  uint8 *dstPixel;
174  dstPixel = (uint8 *)(base + TWIDDLE(x, y));
175  *dstPixel = *srcPixel;
176 
177  srcPixel++;
178  }
179  }
180  }
181  }
182  }
183  break;
184 
185  case 16:
186  {
187  int32 j;
188 
189  for (j = 0; j < tilesY; j++)
190  {
191  int32 i;
192 
193  for (i = 0; i < tilesX; i++)
194  {
195  int32 y;
196  uint8 *base;
197 
198  base = (uint8 *)(((uint16 *)dstBuffer) +
199  ((tileSize * tilesX) * j) +
200  (tileSize * i));
201 
202  for (y = 0; y < tilesSizeY; y++)
203  {
204  uint16 *srcPixel;
205  int32 x;
206 
207  srcPixel = (uint16 *)(((uint8 *)srcBuffer) +
208  (stride * (tilesSizeY * j)) +
209  (2 * tilesSizeX * i) +
210  (stride * y));
211 
212  for (x = 0; x < tilesSizeX; x++)
213  {
214  uint16 *dstPixel;
215  dstPixel = (uint16 *)(base + (TWIDDLE(x, y) << 1));
216  *dstPixel = *srcPixel;
217 
218  srcPixel++;
219  }
220  }
221  }
222  }
223  }
224  break;
225 
226  case 24:
227  case 32:
228  {
229  int32 j;
230 
231  for (j = 0; j < tilesY; j++)
232  {
233  int32 i;
234 
235  for (i = 0; i < tilesX; i++)
236  {
237  int32 y;
238  uint8 *base;
239 
240  base = (uint8 *)(((uint32 *)dstBuffer) +
241  ((tileSize * tilesX) * j) +
242  (tileSize * i));
243 
244  for (y = 0; y < tilesSizeY; y++)
245  {
246  uint32 *srcPixel;
247  int32 x;
248 
249  srcPixel = (uint32 *)(((uint8 *)srcBuffer) +
250  (stride * (tilesSizeY * j)) +
251  (4 * tilesSizeX * i) +
252  (stride * y));
253 
254  for (x = 0; x < tilesSizeX; x++)
255  {
256  uint32 *dstPixel;
257  dstPixel = (uint32 *)(base + (TWIDDLE(x, y) << 2));
258  *dstPixel = *srcPixel;
259 
260  srcPixel++;
261  }
262  }
263  }
264  }
265  }
266  break;
267 
268  default:
269  exit( 0 );
270  break;
271  }
272 }

Перекрестные ссылки generateSwizzleTable(), Nx::x и Nx::y.

Используется в LoadFont().

Граф вызовов:

◆ InitialiseMemoryResidentFont()

SFont * NxXbox::InitialiseMemoryResidentFont ( void  )

См. определение в файле chars.cpp строка 280

282  return LoadFont((const char*)xbmemfnt, true );
283 }

Перекрестные ссылки LoadFont() и xbmemfnt.

Используется в InitialiseEngine().

Граф вызовов:
Граф вызова функции:

◆ LoadFont()

SFont * NxXbox::LoadFont ( const char *  Filename,
bool  memory_resident 
)

См. определение в файле chars.cpp строка 291

292 {
293  SFont* pFont;
294  SChar* pChar;
295  uint8* pData;
296  void* p_FH;
297  int i,Len,NumChars,Width,Height,Depth,NumBytes;
298 
299  // Build the full filename.
300  char filename[128];
301 
302  if( !memory_resident )
303  {
304  strcpy( filename, "fonts/" );
305  strcat( filename, Filename );
306  strcat( filename, ".fnt.xbx" );
307  }
308 
309  // Open the font file.
310  if( !memory_resident )
311  p_FH = File::Open( filename, "rb" );
312 
313  // Allocate memory for the font structure.
314  pFont = new SFont();
315 
316  // Allocate a temporary buffer.
317  uint8 FontBuf[2048];
318 
319  // Load file header.
320  if( !memory_resident )
321  {
322  Len = File::Read( FontBuf, 16, 1, p_FH );
323  Dbg_MsgAssert( Len == 16, ( "couldn't read file header from font file %s", Filename ));
324  }
325  else
326  {
327  CopyMemory( FontBuf, Filename, 16 );
328  Filename += 16;
329  }
330 
331  NumChars = ((uint32 *)FontBuf)[1];
332  pFont->DefaultHeight = ((uint32 *)FontBuf)[2];
333  pFont->DefaultBase = ((uint32 *)FontBuf)[3];
334 
335  // Clear character map to zero.
336  memset( pFont->Map, 0, 256 );
337  memset( pFont->SpecialMap, 0, 32 );
338 
339  // Allocate memory for character table.
340  pFont->pChars = new SChar[NumChars];
341 
342  // Load character map and character table.
343  if( !memory_resident )
344  {
345  Len = File::Read( FontBuf, NumChars << 2, 1, p_FH );
346  Dbg_MsgAssert( Len == ( NumChars << 2 ), ( "couldn't read character table in font file %s", Filename ));
347  }
348  else
349  {
350  CopyMemory( FontBuf, Filename, NumChars << 2 );
351  Filename += NumChars << 2;
352  }
353 
354  for( i = 0, pChar = pFont->pChars, pData = FontBuf; i < NumChars; i++,pChar++,pData += 4 )
355  {
356  pChar->Baseline = ((uint16 *)pData)[0];
357  sint16 ascii_val = ((sint16 *)pData)[1];
358  if (ascii_val >= 0)
359  pFont->Map[(uint8) ascii_val] = i;
360  else
361  {
362  Dbg_Assert(ascii_val >= -32)
363  pFont->SpecialMap[(uint8) (-ascii_val - 1)] = i;
364  }
365  }
366 
367  // If there is a null character in the font, make characters that could not be found
368  // in the font display that instead of 'A'
369  if( pFont->SpecialMap[31] != 0 )
370  {
371  for( i = 0; i < 256; ++i )
372  {
373  if( pFont->Map[i] == 0 && i != 'A' && i != 'a')
374  pFont->Map[i] = pFont->SpecialMap[31];
375 
376  if( i < 31 && pFont->SpecialMap[i] == 0 )
377  pFont->SpecialMap[i] = pFont->SpecialMap[31];
378  }
379  }
380 
381  // Load texture header.
382  if( !memory_resident )
383  {
384  Len = File::Read( FontBuf, 16, 1, p_FH );
385  Dbg_MsgAssert( Len == 16, ( "couldn't read texture header from font file %s", Filename ));
386  }
387  else
388  {
389  CopyMemory( FontBuf, Filename, 16 );
390  Filename += 16;
391  }
392 
393  Width = ((uint16 *)FontBuf)[2];
394  Height = ((uint16 *)FontBuf)[3];
395  Depth = ((uint16 *)FontBuf)[4];
396 
397  // Create texture.
398  Dbg_Assert( Depth == 8 );
399  if( D3D_OK != D3DDevice_CreateTexture( Width, Height, 1, 0, D3DFMT_P8, 0, &pFont->pD3DTexture ))
400  {
401  Dbg_Assert( 0 );
402  return NULL;
403  }
404 
405  // Read texture bitmap data (into temp buffer so we can then swizzle it).
406  NumBytes = ( Width * Height + 3 ) & 0xFFFFFFFC;
407 
408  uint8* p_temp_texel_data = new uint8[NumBytes];
409  if( !memory_resident )
410  {
411  Len = File::Read( p_temp_texel_data, NumBytes, 1, p_FH );
412  Dbg_MsgAssert( Len == NumBytes, ( "Couldn't read texture bitmap from font file %s", Filename ));
413  }
414  else
415  {
416  CopyMemory( p_temp_texel_data, Filename, NumBytes );
417  Filename += NumBytes;
418  }
419 
420  // Lock the texture so we can swizzle into it directly.
421  D3DLOCKED_RECT locked_rect;
422  if( D3D_OK != pFont->pD3DTexture->LockRect( 0, &locked_rect, NULL, 0 ))
423  {
424  Dbg_Assert( 0 );
425  return NULL;
426  }
427 
428  // Swizzle the texture data.
429  SwizzleTexture( locked_rect.pBits, p_temp_texel_data, Width, Height, 8, Width );
430 
431  // No longer need this data.
432  delete[] p_temp_texel_data;
433 
434  // Create palette.
435  if( D3D_OK != D3DDevice_CreatePalette( D3DPALETTE_256, &pFont->pD3DPalette ))
436  {
437  Dbg_Assert( 0 );
438  return NULL;
439  }
440 
441  // Read clut bitmap data.
442  D3DCOLOR *p_clut;
443  pFont->pD3DPalette->Lock( &p_clut, 0 );
444 
445  if( !memory_resident )
446  {
447  Len = File::Read( p_clut, 1024, 1, p_FH );
448  Dbg_MsgAssert( Len == 1024, ( "couldn't read clut bitmap from font file %s", Filename ));
449  }
450  else
451  {
452  CopyMemory( p_clut, Filename, 1024 );
453  Filename += 1024;
454  }
455 
456  // Switch from RGBA to BGRA format palette.
457  for( i = 0; i < 256; ++i )
458  {
459  uint32 red = p_clut[i] & 0xFF;
460  uint32 blu = ( p_clut[i] >> 16 ) & 0xFF;
461 
462  // Double the alpha in the clut (currently limited to 0x80).
463  uint32 alpha = p_clut[i] >> 24;
464  alpha = ( alpha >= 0x80 ) ? 0xFF : ( alpha * 2 );
465  p_clut[i] = ( alpha << 24 ) | ( p_clut[i] & 0x0000FF00 ) | ( red << 16 ) | ( blu );
466  }
467 
468  // Skip numsubtextures, and load subtextures.
469  if( !memory_resident )
470  {
471  Len = File::Read( FontBuf, ( NumChars << 3 ) + 4, 1, p_FH );
472  Dbg_MsgAssert( Len == ( NumChars << 3 ) + 4, ( "couldn't read subtexture table from font file %s", Filename ));
473  }
474  else
475  {
476  CopyMemory( FontBuf, Filename, ( NumChars << 3 ) + 4 );
477  Filename += ( NumChars << 3 ) + 4;
478  }
479 
480  for( i = 0, pChar = pFont->pChars, pData = FontBuf + 4; i < NumChars; i++, pChar++, pData += 8 )
481  {
482  uint16 x = ((uint16 *)pData )[0];
483  uint16 y = ((uint16 *)pData )[1];
484  uint16 w = ((uint16 *)pData )[2];
485  uint16 h = ((uint16 *)pData )[3];
486 
487  pChar->w = w;
488  pChar->h = h;
489  pChar->u0 = (float)x / (float)Width;
490  pChar->v0 = (float)y / (float)Height;
491  pChar->u1 = pChar->u0 + ((float)w / (float)Width );
492  pChar->v1 = pChar->v0 + ((float)h / (float)Height );
493  }
494 
495  // Add font to font list.
496  pFont->pNext = pFontList;
497  pFontList = pFont;
498 
499  // We're done with the font file now.
500  if( !memory_resident )
501  File::Close( p_FH );
502 
503  // this will serve as the default spacing
504  pFont->mSpaceSpacing = pFont->pChars[pFont->Map['I']].w;
505 
506  return pFont;
507 }

Перекрестные ссылки NxXbox::SChar::Baseline, File::Close(), NxXbox::SFont::DefaultBase, NxXbox::SFont::DefaultHeight, NxXbox::SChar::h, NxXbox::SFont::Map, NxXbox::SFont::mSpaceSpacing, File::Open(), NxXbox::SFont::pChars, NxXbox::SFont::pD3DPalette, NxXbox::SFont::pD3DTexture, NxNgc::pData, pFontList, NxXbox::SFont::pNext, File::Read(), NxXbox::SFont::SpecialMap, SwizzleTexture(), NxXbox::SChar::u0, NxXbox::SChar::u1, NxXbox::SChar::v0, NxXbox::SChar::v1, NxXbox::SChar::w, Nx::x и Nx::y.

Используется в InitialiseMemoryResidentFont() и Nx::CXboxFont::plat_load().

Граф вызовов:
Граф вызова функции:

◆ UnloadFont()

void NxXbox::UnloadFont ( SFont *  pFont)

См. определение в файле chars.cpp строка 515

516 {
517  SFont* pPrevFont;
518  int found = 0;
519 
520  // Find font and unchain from list.
521  if( pFontList == pFont )
522  {
523  found=1;
524  pFontList = pFontList->pNext;
525  }
526  else
527  {
528  for( pPrevFont=pFontList; pPrevFont->pNext; pPrevFont=pPrevFont->pNext )
529  {
530  if( pPrevFont->pNext == pFont )
531  {
532  found = 1;
533  pPrevFont->pNext = pFont->pNext;
534  break;
535  }
536  }
537  }
538 
539  Dbg_MsgAssert( found, ( "Attempt to unload font which has not been loaded" ));
540 
541  // Free memory.
542  delete [] pFont->pChars;
543  delete pFont;
544 }

129  // Cap it....
130  fr = ( fr < 0.0f ) ? 0.0f : (( fr > 1.0f ) ? 1.0f : fr );
131  fg = ( fg < 0.0f ) ? 0.0f : (( fg > 1.0f ) ? 1.0f : fg );
132  fb = ( fb < 0.0f ) ? 0.0f : (( fb > 1.0f ) ? 1.0f : fb );
133 
134  // Scale it....
135  fr *= MAX_GAMMA;
136  fg *= MAX_GAMMA;
137  fb *= MAX_GAMMA;
138

155 {
156  // Peform the opposite operation to that done in SetGammaNormalized().
157  *fr = ( gammaValueR - 0.5f ) / MAX_GAMMA;
158  *fg = ( gammaValueG - 0.5f ) / MAX_GAMMA;
159  *fb = ( gammaValueB - 0.5f ) / MAX_GAMMA;
160 }

См. определение в файле gamma.cpp строка 178

◆ sort_by_bone_transform()

static int NxXbox::sort_by_bone_transform ( const void *  p1,
const void *  p2 
)
static

См. определение в файле instance.cpp строка 23

24 {
25  CInstance *p_mesh1 = *((CInstance**)p1 );
26  CInstance *p_mesh2 = *((CInstance**)p2 );
27 
28  Mth::Matrix *p_mat1 = p_mesh1->GetBoneTransforms();
29  Mth::Matrix *p_mat2 = p_mesh2->GetBoneTransforms();
30 
31  if(( p_mat1 == NULL ) || ( p_mesh1->GetScene()->m_numHierarchyObjects > 0 ))
32  {
33  if(( p_mat2 == NULL ) || ( p_mesh2->GetScene()->m_numHierarchyObjects > 0 ))
34  {
35  int num_st1 = p_mesh1->GetScene()->m_num_semitransparent_mesh_entries;
36  int num_st2 = p_mesh2->GetScene()->m_num_semitransparent_mesh_entries;
37 
38  if( num_st1 == num_st2 )
39  {
40  // Try sorting on the material draw order of the first semitransparent mesh.
41  if( num_st1 > 0 )
42  {
43  NxXbox::sMaterial *p_material1 = p_mesh1->GetScene()->m_meshes[p_mesh1->GetScene()->m_first_semitransparent_entry]->mp_material;
44  NxXbox::sMaterial *p_material2 = p_mesh2->GetScene()->m_meshes[p_mesh2->GetScene()->m_first_semitransparent_entry]->mp_material;
45 
46  if( p_material1 && p_material2 )
47  {
48  return ( p_material1->m_draw_order > p_material2->m_draw_order ) ? 1 : (( p_material1->m_draw_order < p_material2->m_draw_order ) ? -1 : 0 );
49  }
50  }
51  return 0;
52  }
53 
54  return ( num_st1 > num_st2 ) ? 1 : -1;
55  }
56  return 1;
57  }
58  else if(( p_mat2 == NULL ) || ( p_mesh2->GetScene()->m_numHierarchyObjects > 0 ))
59  {
60  return -1;
61  }
62 
63  // At this stage we know both instances have bone transforms.
64  if( p_mat1 == p_mat2 )
65  {
66  int num_st1 = p_mesh1->GetScene()->m_num_semitransparent_mesh_entries;
67  int num_st2 = p_mesh2->GetScene()->m_num_semitransparent_mesh_entries;
68 
69  if( num_st1 == num_st2 )
70  return 0;
71 
72  return ( num_st1 > num_st2 ) ? 1 : -1;
73  }
74 
75  return((uint32)p_mat1 > (uint32)p_mat2 ) ? 1 : -1;
76 }

Перекрестные ссылки NxXbox::CInstance::GetBoneTransforms(), NxXbox::CInstance::GetScene(), NxXbox::sMaterial::m_draw_order, NxXbox::sScene::m_first_semitransparent_entry, NxXbox::sScene::m_meshes, NxXbox::sScene::m_num_semitransparent_mesh_entries, NxXbox::sScene::m_numHierarchyObjects, NxXbox::sMesh::mp_material, p1 и p2.

Используется в render_instances().

Граф вызовов:
Граф вызова функции:

◆ render_instance()

void NxXbox::render_instance ( CInstance *  p_instance,
uint32  flags 
)

См. определение в файле instance.cpp строка 84

85 {
86  // Seed the static pointer off to NULL, otherwise if there is only one object with bone transforms, it will never update.
87  pLastBoneTransforms = NULL;
88 
89  if( p_instance->GetActive())
90  {
91  set_frustum_bbox_transform( p_instance->GetTransform());
92 
93  bool render = true;
94  if( !( flags & vRENDER_NO_CULLING ))
95  {
96  // Check whether this instance is visible.
97  render = false;
98  if( frustum_check_sphere( &p_instance->GetScene()->m_sphere_center, p_instance->GetScene()->m_sphere_radius ))
99  {
100  if( !TestSphereAgainstOccluders( &p_instance->GetScene()->m_sphere_center, p_instance->GetScene()->m_sphere_radius ))
101  {
102  render = true;
103  }
104  }
105  }
106 
107  if( render )
108  {
109  if( p_instance->GetBoneTransforms() != NULL )
110  {
111  startup_weighted_mesh_vertex_shader();
112  p_instance->Render( vRENDER_OPAQUE | vRENDER_SEMITRANSPARENT );
113  shutdown_weighted_mesh_vertex_shader();
114  }
115  else
116  {
117  p_instance->Render( vRENDER_OPAQUE | vRENDER_SEMITRANSPARENT );
118  }
119  }
120 
121  // Restore world transform to identity.
122  D3DDevice_SetTransform( D3DTS_WORLD, &EngineGlobals.world_matrix );
123  set_frustum_bbox_transform( NULL );
124  }
125 }

Перекрестные ссылки EngineGlobals, Gfx::flags, frustum_check_sphere(), NxXbox::CInstance::GetActive(), NxXbox::CInstance::GetBoneTransforms(), NxXbox::CInstance::GetScene(), NxXbox::CInstance::GetTransform(), NxXbox::sScene::m_sphere_center, NxXbox::sScene::m_sphere_radius, pLastBoneTransforms, NxXbox::CInstance::Render(), set_frustum_bbox_transform(), shutdown_weighted_mesh_vertex_shader(), startup_weighted_mesh_vertex_shader(), TestSphereAgainstOccluders(), vRENDER_NO_CULLING, vRENDER_OPAQUE, vRENDER_SEMITRANSPARENT и NxXbox::sEngineGlobals::world_matrix.

Используется в render_shadow_targets().

Граф вызовов:
Граф вызова функции:

◆ render_instances()

void NxXbox::render_instances ( uint32  flags)

См. определение в файле instance.cpp строка 133

134 {
135  #define INSTANCE_ARRAY_SIZE 4096
136  static CInstance *p_instances[INSTANCE_ARRAY_SIZE];
137  int current_index = 0;
138 
139  Mth::Matrix t;
140  t.Identity();
141 
142  // Seed the static pointer off to NULL, otherwise if there is only one object with bone transforms, it will never update.
143  pLastBoneTransforms = NULL;
144 
145  // First go through and build a list of the visible instances.
146  CInstance *p_instance = pFirstInstance;
147  while( p_instance )
148  {
149  if( p_instance->GetActive())
150  {
151  // Check to see whether this instance is of the type we want to render - opaque or semitransparent.
152  if((( flags & vRENDER_OPAQUE ) && ( p_instance->GetScene()->m_num_mesh_entries > p_instance->GetScene()->m_num_semitransparent_mesh_entries )) ||
153  (( flags & vRENDER_SEMITRANSPARENT ) && ( p_instance->GetScene()->m_num_semitransparent_mesh_entries > 0 )))
154  {
155  // Check whether this instance is visible - if so, place it in the visible array.
156  t.SetPos( p_instance->GetTransform()->GetPos());
157  set_frustum_bbox_transform( &t );
158 
159  // For skinned objects, we have no idea how the skeleton transforms will be affecting the final position of each object.
160  // This can sometimes result in small objects getting culled incorrectly. For these objects, increase the size of
161  // the bounding sphere slightly.
162  float radius = p_instance->GetScene()->m_sphere_radius;
163  if( p_instance->GetBoneTransforms() && ( p_instance->GetScene()->m_numHierarchyObjects == 0 ))
164  {
165  radius = ( radius < 72.0f ) ? 72.0f : radius;
166  }
167 
168  // The logic code already sets the active flag based on visibility, so there is no need to perform a second visibility check
169  // at this point.
170  // We do, however, want to test against occluders.
171  if( !TestSphereAgainstOccluders( &p_instance->GetScene()->m_sphere_center, radius ))
172  {
173  Dbg_Assert( current_index < INSTANCE_ARRAY_SIZE );
174  p_instances[current_index++] = p_instance;
175  }
176  }
177  }
178  p_instance = p_instance->GetNextInstance();
179  }
180 
181  // Now sort the list based on bone transform and number of semitransparent objects in scene.
182  if( current_index > 0 )
183  {
184  qsort( p_instances, current_index, sizeof( CInstance* ), sort_by_bone_transform );
185 
186  int i = 0;
187 
188  // First render the instances with bone transforms.
189  startup_weighted_mesh_vertex_shader();
190  for( ; i < current_index; ++i )
191  {
192  if(( p_instances[i]->GetBoneTransforms() == NULL ) || ( p_instances[i]->GetScene()->m_numHierarchyObjects > 0 ))
193  break;
194 
195  if(( flags & vRENDER_OPAQUE ) || (( flags & vRENDER_SEMITRANSPARENT ) && ( flags & vRENDER_INSTANCE_PRE_WORLD_SEMITRANSPARENT )))
196  p_instances[i]->Render( flags );
197  }
198  shutdown_weighted_mesh_vertex_shader();
199 
200  // Then the instances with no bone transforms. These will require fixed function lighting.
201  D3DDevice_SetRenderState( D3DRS_LIGHTING, TRUE );
202  D3DDevice_SetRenderState( D3DRS_COLORVERTEX, TRUE );
203  D3DDevice_LightEnable( 0, TRUE );
204  D3DDevice_LightEnable( 1, TRUE );
205 
206  Mth::Vector current_cam_pos( EngineGlobals.cam_position.x, EngineGlobals.cam_position.y, EngineGlobals.cam_position.z );
207 
208  // Get the (square of) the distance at which env mapping will be disabled, in inches.
209  float env_map_disable_distance = Script::GetFloat( CRCD( 0x4e7dc608, "EnvMapDisableDistance")) * 12.0f;
210  env_map_disable_distance = env_map_disable_distance * env_map_disable_distance;
211 
212  for( ; i < current_index; ++i )
213  {
214  // Calculate the distance from the current camera to the instance.
215  float dist_squared = Mth::DistanceSqr( p_instances[i]->GetTransform()->GetPos(), current_cam_pos );
216 
217  // At forty feet, environment mapping is turned off.
218  EngineGlobals.allow_envmapping = ( dist_squared > env_map_disable_distance ) ? false : true;
219 
220  if(( flags & vRENDER_OPAQUE ) || (( flags & vRENDER_SEMITRANSPARENT ) && ( flags & vRENDER_INSTANCE_POST_WORLD_SEMITRANSPARENT )))
221  p_instances[i]->Render( flags );
222  }
223 
224  // Restore environment mapping..
225  EngineGlobals.allow_envmapping = true;
226 
227  // Shut down fixed function lighting.
228  D3DDevice_SetRenderState( D3DRS_LIGHTING, FALSE );
229  D3DDevice_SetRenderState( D3DRS_COLORVERTEX, FALSE );
230  D3DDevice_LightEnable( 0, FALSE );
231  D3DDevice_LightEnable( 1, FALSE );
232  }
233 
234  // Restore world transform to identity.
235  D3DDevice_SetTransform( D3DTS_WORLD, &EngineGlobals.world_matrix );
236  set_frustum_bbox_transform( NULL );
237 }

Перекрестные ссылки NxXbox::sEngineGlobals::allow_envmapping, NxXbox::sEngineGlobals::cam_position, NxNgc::current_index, Mth::DistanceSqr(), EngineGlobals, Gfx::flags, NxXbox::CInstance::GetActive(), NxXbox::CInstance::GetBoneTransforms(), Script::GetFloat(), NxXbox::CInstance::GetNextInstance(), GetPos(), Mth::Matrix::GetPos(), NxXbox::CInstance::GetScene(), NxXbox::CInstance::GetTransform(), Mth::Matrix::Identity(), NxXbox::sScene::m_num_mesh_entries, NxXbox::sScene::m_num_semitransparent_mesh_entries, NxXbox::sScene::m_numHierarchyObjects, NxXbox::sScene::m_sphere_center, NxXbox::sScene::m_sphere_radius, NxNgc::p_instances, pFirstInstance, pLastBoneTransforms, NxXbox::CInstance::Render(), set_frustum_bbox_transform(), Mth::Matrix::SetPos(), shutdown_weighted_mesh_vertex_shader(), sort_by_bone_transform(), startup_weighted_mesh_vertex_shader(), TestSphereAgainstOccluders(), vRENDER_INSTANCE_POST_WORLD_SEMITRANSPARENT, vRENDER_INSTANCE_PRE_WORLD_SEMITRANSPARENT, vRENDER_OPAQUE, vRENDER_SEMITRANSPARENT и NxXbox::sEngineGlobals::world_matrix.

Граф вызовов:

DWORD NxXbox::F2DW ( FLOAT  f)
inline

265  return *( ( DWORD *) & f );
266 }

Граф вызова функции:

◆ GetMaterial()

sMaterial* NxXbox::GetMaterial ( uint32  checksum,
sScene *  p_scene 
)

См. определение в файле material.cpp строка 526

527 {
528  if( p_scene->pMaterialTable )
529  {
530  p_scene->pMaterialTable->IterateStart();
531  sMaterial *p_mat = p_scene->pMaterialTable->IterateNext();
532  while( p_mat )
533  {
534  if( p_mat->m_checksum == checksum )
535  {
536  return p_mat;
537  }
538  p_mat = p_scene->pMaterialTable->IterateNext();
539  }
540  }
541  return NULL;
542 }

Перекрестные ссылки NxXbox::sMaterial::m_checksum и NxXbox::sScene::pMaterialTable.

Используется в NxXbox::sBillboardManager::GetBatch().

Граф вызова функции:

◆ LoadMaterialsFromMemory()

Lst::HashTable< sMaterial > * NxXbox::LoadMaterialsFromMemory ( void **  pp_mem,
Lst::HashTable< Nx::CTexture > *  p_texture_table 
)

См. определение в файле material.cpp строка 554

555 {
556  uint8 *p_data = (uint8*)( *pp_mem );
557  uint32 MMAG, MMIN, K, L, NumSeqs, seq, NumKeys;
558 
559  // Get number of materials.
560  uint32 new_materials;
561  MemoryRead( &new_materials, sizeof( uint32 ), 1, p_data );
562 
563  Lst::HashTable< sMaterial >* pMaterialTable;
564 
565  // Create table, dynamically sizing it based on the number of new materials.
566  uint32 optimal_table_size = new_materials * 2;
567  uint32 test = 4;
568  uint32 size = 2;
569 
570  for( ;; test <<= 1, ++size )
571  {
572  // Check if this iteration of table size is sufficient, or if we have hit the maximum size.
573  if(( optimal_table_size < test ) || ( size >= 12 ))
574  {
575  pMaterialTable = new Lst::HashTable< sMaterial >( size );
576  break;
577  }
578  }
579 
580  // Loop over materials.
581  for( uint32 i = 0; i < new_materials; ++i )
582  {
583  // Create new material.
584  sMaterial *pMat = new sMaterial;
585 
586  // Get material checksum.
587  MemoryRead( &pMat->m_checksum, sizeof( uint32 ), 1, p_data );
588 
589  // Get material name checksum.
590  MemoryRead( &pMat->m_name_checksum, sizeof( uint32 ), 1, p_data );
591 
592  // Get number of passes.
593  MemoryRead( &pMat->m_passes, sizeof( uint32 ), 1, p_data );
594 
595  // Get alpha cutoff value.
596  uint32 AlphaCutoff;
597  MemoryRead( &AlphaCutoff, sizeof( uint32 ), 1, p_data );
598  Dbg_Assert( AlphaCutoff <= 0xFF );
599  pMat->m_alpha_cutoff = (uint8)AlphaCutoff;
600 
601  // Get sorted flag.
602  MemoryRead( &pMat->m_sorted, sizeof( bool ), 1, p_data );
603 
604  // Get draw order.
605  MemoryRead( &pMat->m_draw_order, sizeof( float ), 1, p_data );
606 
607  // Get single sided flag.
608  bool single_sided;
609  MemoryRead( &single_sided, sizeof( bool ), 1, p_data );
610 
611  // Get backface cull flag.
612  MemoryRead( &pMat->m_no_bfc, sizeof( bool ), 1, p_data );
613 
614  // Get z-bias value.
615  int zbias;
616  MemoryRead( &zbias, sizeof( int ), 1, p_data );
617  pMat->m_zbias = (uint8)(( zbias > 16 ) ? 16 : zbias );
618 
619  // Get grassify flag and (optionally) grassify data.
620  bool grassify;
621  MemoryRead( &grassify, sizeof( bool ), 1, p_data );
622  if( grassify )
623  {
624  MemoryRead( &pMat->m_grass_height, sizeof( float ), 1, p_data );
625  MemoryRead( &pMat->m_grass_layers, sizeof( int ), 1, p_data );
626  }
627 
628  // Get specular power and (optionally) specular color.
629  MemoryRead( &pMat->m_specular_color[3], sizeof( float ), 1, p_data );
630  if( pMat->m_specular_color[3] > 0.0f )
631  {
632  MemoryRead( &pMat->m_specular_color[0], sizeof( float ) * 3, 1, p_data );
633  }
634 
635  // Neutral under proven otherwise.
636  bool neutral_material_color = true;
637  for( uint32 pass = 0; pass < pMat->m_passes; ++pass )
638  {
639  // Get texture checksum.
640  uint32 TextureChecksum;
641  MemoryRead( &TextureChecksum, sizeof( uint32 ), 1, p_data );
642 
643  // Get material flags.
644  MemoryRead( &pMat->m_flags[pass], sizeof( uint32 ), 1, p_data );
645 
646  // Get pass color flag.
647  bool has_color;
648  MemoryRead( &has_color, sizeof( bool ), 1, p_data );
649 
650  // Get pass color.
651  MemoryRead( &pMat->m_color[pass][0], sizeof( float ) * 3, 1, p_data );
652 
653  // Check for color being neutral.
654  if( neutral_material_color )
655  {
656  if(( pMat->m_color[pass][0] != 0.5f ) || ( pMat->m_color[pass][1] != 0.5f ) || ( pMat->m_color[pass][2] != 0.5f ))
657  {
658  neutral_material_color = false;
659  }
660  }
661 
662  // Get ALPHA register value.
663  uint64 reg_alpha;
664  MemoryRead( &reg_alpha, sizeof( uint64 ), 1, p_data );
665 
666  uint32 blend_mode = (uint32)( reg_alpha & 0xFFFFFFUL );
667  uint32 fixed_alpha = (uint32)( reg_alpha >> 32 );
668  pMat->m_reg_alpha[pass] = blend_mode | ( fixed_alpha << 24 );
669 
670  // Also calculate the floating point version of the fixed alpha.
671  pMat->m_color[pass][3] = fixed_alpha / 128.0f;
672 
673  // Backface cull test - if this is an alpha blended material, turn off backface culling, except
674  // where the material has been explicitly flagged as single sided.
675  if(( pass == 0 ) && !single_sided && (( pMat->m_reg_alpha[pass] & sMaterial::BLEND_MODE_MASK ) != 0x00 ))
676  {
677  pMat->m_no_bfc = true;
678  }
679 
680  // Get UV addressing types.
681  uint32 u_addressing, v_addressing;
682  MemoryRead( &u_addressing, sizeof( uint32 ), 1, p_data );
683  MemoryRead( &v_addressing, sizeof( uint32 ), 1, p_data );
684  pMat->m_uv_addressing[pass] = (( v_addressing << 16 ) | u_addressing );
685 
686  // Get environment map u and v tiling multiples.
687  MemoryRead( &pMat->m_envmap_tiling[pass][0], sizeof( float ) * 2, 1, p_data );
688 
689  // Get minification and magnification filtering mode.
690  MemoryRead( &pMat->m_filtering_mode[pass], sizeof( uint32 ), 1, p_data );
691 
692  // Read uv wibble data if present.
693  if( pMat->m_flags[pass] & MATFLAG_UV_WIBBLE )
694  {
695  // Flag that this material wibbles.
696  pMat->m_uv_wibble = true;
697 
698  // Create uv wibble params structure.
699  pMat->mp_UVWibbleParams[pass] = new sUVWibbleParams;
700  MemoryRead( pMat->mp_UVWibbleParams[pass], sizeof( float ) * 8, 1, p_data );
701  }
702 
703  // Read vertex color wibble data.
704  if(( pass == 0 ) && ( pMat->m_flags[0] & MATFLAG_VC_WIBBLE ))
705  {
706  MemoryRead( &NumSeqs, sizeof( uint32 ), 1, p_data );
707  pMat->m_num_wibble_vc_anims = NumSeqs;
708 
709  // Create sequence data array.
710  pMat->mp_wibble_vc_params = new sVCWibbleParams[NumSeqs];
711 
712  // Create resultant color array.
713  pMat->mp_wibble_vc_colors = new D3DCOLOR[NumSeqs];
714 
715  for( seq = 0; seq < NumSeqs; ++seq )
716  {
717  MemoryRead( &NumKeys, sizeof( uint32 ), 1, p_data );
718 
719  int phase;
720  MemoryRead( &phase, sizeof( int ), 1, p_data );
721 
722  // Create array for keyframes.
723  pMat->mp_wibble_vc_params[seq].m_num_keyframes = NumKeys;
724  pMat->mp_wibble_vc_params[seq].m_phase = phase;
725  pMat->mp_wibble_vc_params[seq].mp_keyframes = new sVCWibbleKeyframe[NumKeys];
726 
727  // Read keyframes into array.
728  MemoryRead( pMat->mp_wibble_vc_params[seq].mp_keyframes, sizeof( sVCWibbleKeyframe ), NumKeys, p_data );
729  }
730  }
731 
732  // Read texture wibble data.
733  if( pMat->m_flags[pass] & MATFLAG_PASS_TEXTURE_ANIMATES )
734  {
735  // Create the texture wibble structure if not created yet.
736  if( pMat->mp_wibble_texture_params == NULL )
737  {
738  pMat->mp_wibble_texture_params = new NxXbox::sTextureWibbleParams;
739  ZeroMemory( pMat->mp_wibble_texture_params, sizeof( NxXbox::sTextureWibbleParams ));
740 
741  // Flag the material as having texture wibble.
742  pMat->m_texture_wibble = true;
743  }
744 
745  int num_keyframes, period, iterations, phase;
746  MemoryRead( &num_keyframes, sizeof( int ), 1, p_data );
747  MemoryRead( &period, sizeof( int ), 1, p_data ); // This value is currently discarded.
748  MemoryRead( &iterations, sizeof( int ), 1, p_data );
749  MemoryRead( &phase, sizeof( int ), 1, p_data );
750 
751  Dbg_Assert( num_keyframes > 0 );
752 
753  pMat->mp_wibble_texture_params->m_num_keyframes[pass] = num_keyframes;
754  pMat->mp_wibble_texture_params->m_phase[pass] = phase;
755  pMat->mp_wibble_texture_params->m_num_iterations[pass] = iterations;
756  pMat->mp_wibble_texture_params->mp_keyframes[pass] = new NxXbox::sTextureWibbleKeyframe[num_keyframes];
757 
758  for( int ati = 0; ati < num_keyframes; ++ati )
759  {
760  MemoryRead( &pMat->mp_wibble_texture_params->mp_keyframes[pass][ati].m_time, sizeof( uint32 ), 1, p_data );
761 
762  // Read the texture checksum.
763  uint32 cs;
764  MemoryRead( &cs, sizeof( uint32 ), 1, p_data );
765 
766  // Set the TextureChecksum variable so the mp_tex member will get populated.
767  if( ati == 0 )
768  {
769  TextureChecksum = cs;
770  }
771 
772  // Resolve the checksum to a texture pointer.
773  Nx::CXboxTexture *p_xbox_texture = static_cast<Nx::CXboxTexture*>( p_texture_table->GetItem( cs ));
774  pMat->mp_wibble_texture_params->mp_keyframes[pass][ati].mp_texture = ( p_xbox_texture ) ? p_xbox_texture->GetEngineTexture() : NULL;
775  }
776  }
777 
778  if( TextureChecksum )
779  {
780  // If textured, resolve texture checksum...
781  Nx::CXboxTexture *p_xbox_texture = static_cast<Nx::CXboxTexture*>( p_texture_table->GetItem( TextureChecksum ));
782  sTexture *mp_tex = ( p_xbox_texture ) ? p_xbox_texture->GetEngineTexture() : NULL;
783 
784  // Bail if checksum not found.
785  if( mp_tex == NULL )
786  {
787  Dbg_Message( "error: couldn't find texture checksum %08X\n", TextureChecksum );
788  pMat->mp_tex[pass] = NULL;
789  }
790  else
791  {
792  // Set texture pointer.
793  pMat->mp_tex[pass] = mp_tex;
794  }
795 
796  // Get mipmap info.
797  MemoryRead( &MMAG, sizeof( uint32 ), 1, p_data );
798  MemoryRead( &MMIN, sizeof( uint32 ), 1, p_data );
799  MemoryRead( &K, sizeof( uint32 ), 1, p_data );
800  MemoryRead( &L, sizeof( uint32 ), 1, p_data );
801 
802  // Default PS2 value for K appears to be -8.0f - we are interested in deviations from this value.
803  pMat->m_k[pass] = ( *(float*)&K ) + 8.0f;
804 
805  // Dave note 09/03/02 - having MIPs selected earlier than normal seems to cause some problems, since Xbox
806  // MIP selection is so different to Ps2. Limit the k value such that Xbox can never select smaller MIPs
807  // earlier than it would do by default.
808  if( pMat->m_k[pass] > 0.0f )
809  {
810  pMat->m_k[pass] = 0.0f;
811  }
812  }
813  else
814  {
815  // ...otherwise just step past mipmap info.
816  pMat->mp_tex[pass] = NULL;
817  p_data += 16;
818  }
819  }
820 
821  // Set the no material color flag if appropriate.
822  if( neutral_material_color )
823  {
824  pMat->m_flags[0] |= MATFLAG_NO_MAT_COL_MOD;
825  }
826 
827  // Set the specular flag if appropriate.
828  if( pMat->m_specular_color[3] > 0.0f )
829  {
830  pMat->m_flags[0] |= MATFLAG_SPECULAR;
831  }
832 
833  // There is a problem adding materials with the same checksum into the table.
834  // This could happen when materials in different scenes share the same name.
835  // It also happens for the dummy material (checksum == 0), so for now just special-case
836  // that one.
837  if( pMat->m_checksum == 0 )
838  {
839  if( !pMaterialTable->GetItem( 0 ))
840  {
841  pMaterialTable->PutItem( pMat->m_checksum, pMat );
842  }
843  }
844  else
845  {
846  if( pMaterialTable->GetItem( pMat->m_checksum ))
847  {
848  Dbg_MsgAssert( 0, ( "NXXBOX ERROR: duplicate material: %x\n", pMat->m_checksum ));
849  }
850  else
851  {
852  pMaterialTable->PutItem( pMat->m_checksum, pMat );
853  }
854  }
855  }
856 
857  // Set the data pointer to the new position on return.
858  *pp_mem = p_data;
859 
860  return pMaterialTable;
861 }

Перекрестные ссылки NxXbox::sMaterial::BLEND_MODE_MASK, Dbg_Message(), Nx::CXboxTexture::GetEngineTexture(), Lst::HashTable< _V >::GetItem(), Ed::L, NxXbox::sMaterial::m_alpha_cutoff, NxXbox::sMaterial::m_checksum, NxXbox::sMaterial::m_color, NxXbox::sMaterial::m_draw_order, NxXbox::sMaterial::m_envmap_tiling, NxXbox::sMaterial::m_filtering_mode, NxXbox::sMaterial::m_flags, NxXbox::sMaterial::m_grass_height, NxXbox::sMaterial::m_grass_layers, NxXbox::sMaterial::m_k, NxXbox::sMaterial::m_name_checksum, NxXbox::sMaterial::m_no_bfc, NxXbox::sTextureWibbleParams::m_num_iterations, NxXbox::sVCWibbleParams::m_num_keyframes, NxXbox::sTextureWibbleParams::m_num_keyframes, NxXbox::sMaterial::m_num_wibble_vc_anims, NxXbox::sMaterial::m_passes, NxXbox::sVCWibbleParams::m_phase, NxXbox::sTextureWibbleParams::m_phase, NxXbox::sMaterial::m_reg_alpha, NxXbox::sMaterial::m_sorted, NxXbox::sMaterial::m_specular_color, NxXbox::sMaterial::m_texture_wibble, NxXbox::sTextureWibbleKeyframe::m_time, NxXbox::sMaterial::m_uv_addressing, NxXbox::sMaterial::m_uv_wibble, NxXbox::sMaterial::m_zbias, NxXbox::sVCWibbleParams::mp_keyframes, NxXbox::sTextureWibbleParams::mp_keyframes, NxXbox::sMaterial::mp_tex, NxXbox::sTextureWibbleKeyframe::mp_texture, NxXbox::sMaterial::mp_UVWibbleParams, NxXbox::sMaterial::mp_wibble_texture_params, NxXbox::sMaterial::mp_wibble_vc_colors, NxXbox::sMaterial::mp_wibble_vc_params, Gfx::p_data и Lst::HashTable< _V >::PutItem().

Граф вызовов:

◆ LoadMaterials()

Lst::HashTable< sMaterial > * NxXbox::LoadMaterials ( void *  p_FH,
Lst::HashTable< Nx::CTexture > *  p_texture_table 
)

См. определение в файле material.cpp строка 869

870 {
871  uint32 MMAG, MMIN, K, L, NumSeqs, seq, NumKeys;
872 
873  // Get number of materials.
874  uint32 new_materials;
875  File::Read( &new_materials, sizeof( uint32 ), 1, p_FH );
876 
877  Lst::HashTable< sMaterial >* pMaterialTable;
878 
879  // Create table, dynamically sizing it based on the number of new materials.
880  uint32 optimal_table_size = new_materials * 2;
881  uint32 test = 4;
882  uint32 size = 2;
883 
884  for( ;; test <<= 1, ++size )
885  {
886  // Check if this iteration of table size is sufficient, or if we have hit the maximum size.
887  if(( optimal_table_size < test ) || ( size >= 12 ))
888  {
889  pMaterialTable = new Lst::HashTable< sMaterial >( size );
890  break;
891  }
892  }
893 
894  // Loop over materials.
895  for( uint32 i = 0; i < new_materials; ++i )
896  {
897  // Create new material.
898  sMaterial *pMat = new sMaterial;
899 
900  // Get material checksum.
901  File::Read( &pMat->m_checksum, sizeof( uint32 ), 1, p_FH );
902 
903  // Get material name checksum.
904  File::Read( &pMat->m_name_checksum, sizeof( uint32 ), 1, p_FH );
905 
906  // Get number of passes.
907  File::Read( &pMat->m_passes, sizeof( uint32 ), 1, p_FH );
908 
909  // Get alpha cutoff value.
910  uint32 AlphaCutoff;
911  File::Read( &AlphaCutoff, sizeof( uint32 ), 1, p_FH );
912  pMat->m_alpha_cutoff = (uint8)AlphaCutoff;
913 
914  // Get sorted flag.
915  File::Read( &pMat->m_sorted, sizeof( bool ), 1, p_FH );
916 
917  // Get draw order.
918  File::Read( &pMat->m_draw_order, sizeof( float ), 1, p_FH );
919 
920  // Get single sided flag.
921  bool single_sided;
922  File::Read( &single_sided, sizeof( bool ), 1, p_FH );
923 
924  // Get backface cull flag.
925  File::Read( &pMat->m_no_bfc, sizeof( bool ), 1, p_FH );
926 
927  // Get z-bias value.
928  int zbias;
929  File::Read( &zbias, sizeof( int ), 1, p_FH );
930  pMat->m_zbias = (uint8)(( zbias > 16 ) ? 16 : zbias );
931 
932  // Get grassify flag and (optionally) grassify data.
933  bool grassify;
934  File::Read( &grassify, sizeof( bool ), 1, p_FH );
935  if( grassify )
936  {
937  File::Read( &pMat->m_grass_height, sizeof( float ), 1, p_FH );
938  File::Read( &pMat->m_grass_layers, sizeof( int ), 1, p_FH );
939  }
940 
941  // Get specular power and (optionally) specular color.
942  File::Read( &pMat->m_specular_color[3], sizeof( float ), 1, p_FH );
943  if( pMat->m_specular_color[3] > 0.0f )
944  {
945  File::Read( &pMat->m_specular_color[0], sizeof( float ) * 3, 1, p_FH );
946  }
947 
948  // Neutral under proven otherwise.
949  bool neutral_material_color = true;
950  for( uint32 pass = 0; pass < pMat->m_passes; ++pass )
951  {
952  // Get texture checksum.
953  uint32 TextureChecksum;
954  File::Read( &TextureChecksum, sizeof( uint32 ), 1, p_FH );
955 
956  // Get material flags.
957  File::Read( &pMat->m_flags[pass], sizeof( uint32 ), 1, p_FH );
958 
959  // Get pass color flag.
960  bool has_color;
961  File::Read( &has_color, sizeof( bool ), 1, p_FH );
962 
963  // Get pass color.
964  File::Read( &pMat->m_color[pass][0], sizeof( float ) * 3, 1, p_FH );
965 
966  // Check for color being neutral.
967  if( neutral_material_color )
968  {
969  if(( pMat->m_color[pass][0] != 0.5f ) || ( pMat->m_color[pass][1] != 0.5f ) || ( pMat->m_color[pass][2] != 0.5f ))
970  {
971  neutral_material_color = false;
972  }
973  }
974 
975  // Get ALPHA register value.
976  uint64 reg_alpha;
977  File::Read( &reg_alpha, sizeof( uint64 ), 1, p_FH );
978 
979  uint32 blend_mode = (uint32)( reg_alpha & 0xFFFFFFUL );
980  uint32 fixed_alpha = (uint32)( reg_alpha >> 32 );
981  pMat->m_reg_alpha[pass] = blend_mode | ( fixed_alpha << 24 );
982 
983  // Also calculate the floating point version of the fixed alpha.
984  pMat->m_color[pass][3] = fixed_alpha / 128.0f;
985 
986  // Backface cull test - if this is an alpha blended material, turn off backface culling, except
987  // where the material has been explicitly flagged as single sided.
988  if(( pass == 0 ) && !single_sided && (( pMat->m_reg_alpha[pass] & sMaterial::BLEND_MODE_MASK ) != 0x00 ))
989  {
990  pMat->m_no_bfc = true;
991  }
992 
993  // Get UV addressing types.
994  uint32 u_addressing, v_addressing;
995  File::Read( &u_addressing, sizeof( uint32 ), 1, p_FH );
996  File::Read( &v_addressing, sizeof( uint32 ), 1, p_FH );
997  pMat->m_uv_addressing[pass] = (( v_addressing << 16 ) | u_addressing );
998 
999  // Get environment map u and v tiling multiples.
1000  File::Read( &pMat->m_envmap_tiling[pass][0], sizeof( float ) * 2, 1, p_FH );
1001 
1002  // Get minification and magnification filtering mode.
1003  File::Read( &pMat->m_filtering_mode[pass], sizeof( uint32 ), 1, p_FH );
1004 
1005  // Read uv wibble data if present.
1006  if( pMat->m_flags[pass] & MATFLAG_UV_WIBBLE )
1007  {
1008  // Flag that this material wibbles.
1009  pMat->m_uv_wibble = true;
1010 
1011  // Create uv wibble params structure.
1012  pMat->mp_UVWibbleParams[pass] = new sUVWibbleParams;
1013  File::Read( pMat->mp_UVWibbleParams[pass], sizeof( float ) * 8, 1, p_FH );
1014  }
1015 
1016  // Read vertex color wibble data.
1017  if(( pass == 0 ) && ( pMat->m_flags[0] & MATFLAG_VC_WIBBLE ))
1018  {
1019  File::Read( &NumSeqs, sizeof( uint32 ), 1, p_FH );
1020  pMat->m_num_wibble_vc_anims = NumSeqs;
1021 
1022  // Create sequence data array.
1023  pMat->mp_wibble_vc_params = new sVCWibbleParams[NumSeqs];
1024 
1025  // Create resultant color array.
1026  pMat->mp_wibble_vc_colors = new D3DCOLOR[NumSeqs];
1027 
1028  for( seq = 0; seq < NumSeqs; ++seq )
1029  {
1030  File::Read( &NumKeys, sizeof( uint32 ), 1, p_FH );
1031 
1032  int phase;
1033  File::Read( &phase, sizeof( int ), 1, p_FH );
1034 
1035  // Create array for keyframes.
1036  pMat->mp_wibble_vc_params[seq].m_num_keyframes = NumKeys;
1037  pMat->mp_wibble_vc_params[seq].m_phase = phase;
1038  pMat->mp_wibble_vc_params[seq].mp_keyframes = new sVCWibbleKeyframe[NumKeys];
1039 
1040  // Read keyframes into array.
1041  File::Read( pMat->mp_wibble_vc_params[seq].mp_keyframes, sizeof( sVCWibbleKeyframe ), NumKeys, p_FH );
1042  }
1043  }
1044 
1045  // Read texture wibble data.
1046  if( pMat->m_flags[pass] & MATFLAG_PASS_TEXTURE_ANIMATES )
1047  {
1048  // Create the texture wibble structure if not created yet.
1049  if( pMat->mp_wibble_texture_params == NULL )
1050  {
1051  pMat->mp_wibble_texture_params = new NxXbox::sTextureWibbleParams;
1052  ZeroMemory( pMat->mp_wibble_texture_params, sizeof( NxXbox::sTextureWibbleParams ));
1053 
1054  // Flag the material as having texture wibble.
1055  pMat->m_texture_wibble = true;
1056  }
1057 
1058  int num_keyframes, period, iterations, phase;
1059  File::Read( &num_keyframes, sizeof( int ), 1, p_FH );
1060  File::Read( &period, sizeof( int ), 1, p_FH ); // This value is currently discarded.
1061  File::Read( &iterations, sizeof( int ), 1, p_FH );
1062  File::Read( &phase, sizeof( int ), 1, p_FH );
1063 
1064  Dbg_Assert( num_keyframes > 0 );
1065 
1066  pMat->mp_wibble_texture_params->m_num_keyframes[pass] = num_keyframes;
1067  pMat->mp_wibble_texture_params->m_phase[pass] = phase;
1068  pMat->mp_wibble_texture_params->m_num_iterations[pass] = iterations;
1069  pMat->mp_wibble_texture_params->mp_keyframes[pass] = new NxXbox::sTextureWibbleKeyframe[num_keyframes];
1070 
1071  for( int ati = 0; ati < num_keyframes; ++ati )
1072  {
1073  File::Read( &pMat->mp_wibble_texture_params->mp_keyframes[pass][ati].m_time, sizeof( uint32 ), 1, p_FH );
1074 
1075  // Read the texture checksum.
1076  uint32 cs;
1077  File::Read( &cs, sizeof( uint32 ), 1, p_FH );
1078 
1079  // Set the TextureChecksum variable so the mp_tex member will get populated.
1080  if( ati == 0 )
1081  {
1082  TextureChecksum = cs;
1083  }
1084 
1085  // Resolve the checksum to a texture pointer.
1086  Nx::CXboxTexture *p_xbox_texture = static_cast<Nx::CXboxTexture*>( p_texture_table->GetItem( cs ));
1087  pMat->mp_wibble_texture_params->mp_keyframes[pass][ati].mp_texture = ( p_xbox_texture ) ? p_xbox_texture->GetEngineTexture() : NULL;
1088  }
1089  }
1090 
1091  if( TextureChecksum )
1092  {
1093  // If textured, resolve texture checksum...
1094  Nx::CXboxTexture *p_xbox_texture = static_cast<Nx::CXboxTexture*>( p_texture_table->GetItem( TextureChecksum ));
1095  sTexture *mp_tex = ( p_xbox_texture ) ? p_xbox_texture->GetEngineTexture() : NULL;
1096 
1097  // Bail if checksum not found.
1098  if( mp_tex == NULL )
1099  {
1100  Dbg_Message( "error: couldn't find texture checksum %08X\n", TextureChecksum );
1101  pMat->mp_tex[pass] = NULL;
1102  }
1103  else
1104  {
1105  // Set texture pointer.
1106  pMat->mp_tex[pass] = mp_tex;
1107  }
1108 
1109  // Get mipmap info.
1110  File::Read( &MMAG, sizeof( uint32 ), 1, p_FH );
1111  File::Read( &MMIN, sizeof( uint32 ), 1, p_FH );
1112  File::Read( &K, sizeof( uint32 ), 1, p_FH );
1113  File::Read( &L, sizeof( uint32 ), 1, p_FH );
1114 
1115  // Default PS2 value for K appears to be -8.0f - we are interested in deviations from this value.
1116  pMat->m_k[pass] = ( *(float*)&K ) + 8.0f;
1117 
1118  // Dave note 09/03/02 - having MIPs selected earlier than normal seems to cause some problems, since Xbox
1119  // MIP selection is so different to Ps2. Limit the k value such that Xbox can never select smaller MIPs
1120  // earlier than it would do by default.
1121  if( pMat->m_k[pass] > 0.0f )
1122  {
1123  pMat->m_k[pass] = 0.0f;
1124  }
1125  }
1126  else
1127  {
1128  // ...otherwise just step past mipmap info.
1129  pMat->mp_tex[pass] = NULL;
1130  File::Seek( p_FH, 16, SEEK_CUR );
1131  }
1132  }
1133 
1134  // Set the no material color flag if appropriate.
1135  if( neutral_material_color )
1136  {
1137  pMat->m_flags[0] |= MATFLAG_NO_MAT_COL_MOD;
1138  }
1139 
1140  // Set the specular flag if appropriate.
1141  if( pMat->m_specular_color[3] > 0.0f )
1142  {
1143  pMat->m_flags[0] |= MATFLAG_SPECULAR;
1144  }
1145 
1146  // There is a problem adding materials with the same checksum into the table.
1147  // This could happen when materials in different scenes share the same name.
1148  // It also happens for the dummy material (checksum == 0), so for now just special-case
1149  // that one.
1150  if( pMat->m_checksum == 0 )
1151  {
1152  if( !pMaterialTable->GetItem( 0 ))
1153  {
1154  pMaterialTable->PutItem( pMat->m_checksum, pMat );
1155  }
1156  }
1157  else
1158  {
1159  if( pMaterialTable->GetItem( pMat->m_checksum ))
1160  {
1161  Dbg_MsgAssert( 0, ( "NXXBOX ERROR: duplicate material: %x\n", pMat->m_checksum ));
1162  }
1163  else
1164  {
1165  pMaterialTable->PutItem( pMat->m_checksum, pMat );
1166  }
1167  }
1168  }
1169  return pMaterialTable;
1170 }

Перекрестные ссылки NxXbox::sMaterial::BLEND_MODE_MASK, Dbg_Message(), Nx::CXboxTexture::GetEngineTexture(), Lst::HashTable< _V >::GetItem(), Ed::L, NxXbox::sMaterial::m_alpha_cutoff, NxXbox::sMaterial::m_checksum, NxXbox::sMaterial::m_color, NxXbox::sMaterial::m_draw_order, NxXbox::sMaterial::m_envmap_tiling, NxXbox::sMaterial::m_filtering_mode, NxXbox::sMaterial::m_flags, NxXbox::sMaterial::m_grass_height, NxXbox::sMaterial::m_grass_layers, NxXbox::sMaterial::m_k, NxXbox::sMaterial::m_name_checksum, NxXbox::sMaterial::m_no_bfc, NxXbox::sTextureWibbleParams::m_num_iterations, NxXbox::sVCWibbleParams::m_num_keyframes, NxXbox::sTextureWibbleParams::m_num_keyframes, NxXbox::sMaterial::m_num_wibble_vc_anims, NxXbox::sMaterial::m_passes, NxXbox::sVCWibbleParams::m_phase, NxXbox::sTextureWibbleParams::m_phase, NxXbox::sMaterial::m_reg_alpha, NxXbox::sMaterial::m_sorted, NxXbox::sMaterial::m_specular_color, NxXbox::sMaterial::m_texture_wibble, NxXbox::sTextureWibbleKeyframe::m_time, NxXbox::sMaterial::m_uv_addressing, NxXbox::sMaterial::m_uv_wibble, NxXbox::sMaterial::m_zbias, NxXbox::sVCWibbleParams::mp_keyframes, NxXbox::sTextureWibbleParams::mp_keyframes, NxXbox::sMaterial::mp_tex, NxXbox::sTextureWibbleKeyframe::mp_texture, NxXbox::sMaterial::mp_UVWibbleParams, NxXbox::sMaterial::mp_wibble_texture_params, NxXbox::sMaterial::mp_wibble_vc_colors, NxXbox::sMaterial::mp_wibble_vc_params, Lst::HashTable< _V >::PutItem(), File::Read() и File::Seek().
