1725  sTextureProjectionDetails *p_details = pTextureProjectionDetailsTable->GetItem((uint32)p_texture );
1726  if( p_details )
1727  {
1728  pTextureProjectionDetailsTable->FlushItem((uint32)p_texture );
1729  delete p_details;
1730  }
1731 }

Перекрестные ссылки pTextureProjectionDetailsTable.

◆ set_texture_projection_camera()

void NxXbox::set_texture_projection_camera ( sTexture *  p_texture,
XGVECTOR3 *  p_pos,
XGVECTOR3 *  p_at 
)

См. определение в файле render.cpp строка 1739

1740 {
1741  sTextureProjectionDetails *p_details = pTextureProjectionDetailsTable->GetItem((uint32)p_texture );
1742  if( p_details )
1743  {
1744  // Check for 'straight down' vector.
1745  if(( p_pos->x == p_at->x ) && ( p_pos->z == p_at->z ))
1746  {
1747  XGMatrixLookAtRH( &p_details->view_matrix, p_pos, p_at, &XGVECTOR3( 0.0f, 0.0f, 1.0f ));
1748  }
1749  else
1750  {
1751  XGMatrixLookAtRH( &p_details->view_matrix, p_pos, p_at, &XGVECTOR3( 0.0f, 1.0f, 0.0f ));
1752  }
1753  XGMatrixOrthoRH( &p_details->projection_matrix, 96.0f, 96.0f, 1.0f, 128.0f );
1754  }
1755 }

Перекрестные ссылки p_pos, NxXbox::sTextureProjectionDetails::projection_matrix, pTextureProjectionDetailsTable и NxXbox::sTextureProjectionDetails::view_matrix.

◆ set_camera()

void NxXbox::set_camera ( Mth::Matrix *  p_matrix,
Mth::Vector *  p_position,
float  screen_angle,
float  aspect_ratio,
bool  render_at_infinity 
)

См. определение в файле render.cpp строка 1764

1765 {
1766  EngineGlobals.cam_position.x = p_position->GetX();
1767  EngineGlobals.cam_position.y = p_position->GetY();
1768  EngineGlobals.cam_position.z = p_position->GetZ();
1769 
1770  EngineGlobals.cam_at.x = p_matrix->GetAt().GetX();
1771  EngineGlobals.cam_at.y = p_matrix->GetAt().GetY();
1772  EngineGlobals.cam_at.z = p_matrix->GetAt().GetZ();
1773 
1774  EngineGlobals.cam_up.x = p_matrix->GetUp().GetX();
1775  EngineGlobals.cam_up.y = p_matrix->GetUp().GetY();
1776  EngineGlobals.cam_up.z = p_matrix->GetUp().GetZ();
1777 
1778  XGMatrixIdentity( &EngineGlobals.world_matrix );
1779 
1780  // XGMatrixLookAtRH() takes an 'at' position rather than a direction, so we need it relative to the camera position.
1781  XGVECTOR3 at;
1782  at.x = EngineGlobals.cam_position.x - EngineGlobals.cam_at.x;
1783  at.y = EngineGlobals.cam_position.y - EngineGlobals.cam_at.y;
1784  at.z = EngineGlobals.cam_position.z - EngineGlobals.cam_at.z;
1785  XGMatrixLookAtRH( &EngineGlobals.view_matrix, &EngineGlobals.cam_position, &at, &EngineGlobals.cam_up );
1786 
1787  EngineGlobals.near_plane = 2.0f;
1788  EngineGlobals.far_plane = 32000.0f;
1789  EngineGlobals.screen_angle = screen_angle;
1790 
1791  // Figure width and height of viewport at near clip plane.
1792  float half_screen_angle_in_radians = Mth::DegToRad( screen_angle * 0.5f );
1793  float width = EngineGlobals.near_plane * 2.0f * tanf( half_screen_angle_in_radians );
1794 
1795  if( EngineGlobals.backbuffer_width == 640.0f )
1796  {
1797  // We need to adjust the aspect ratio for the Xbox, since it is now rendering with D3DPRESENTFLAG_10X11PIXELASPECTRATIO
1798  // set. This changes the regular aspect ratio from 4:3 to 4:3.3, so adjust the value here.
1799  aspect_ratio = aspect_ratio * (( 4.0f / 3.3f ) / ( 4.0f / 3.0f ));
1800  }
1801 
1802  float height = width / aspect_ratio;
1803  XGMatrixPerspectiveRH( &EngineGlobals.projection_matrix, width, height, EngineGlobals.near_plane, EngineGlobals.far_plane );
1804 
1805  NxXbox::EngineGlobals.near_plane_width = width;
1806  NxXbox::EngineGlobals.near_plane_height = height;
1807 
1808  if( render_at_infinity )
1809  {
1810  // Rendering the sky, so set the projection transform up to calculate a constant z value of 1.0.
1811  // W value must remain correct however.
1812  EngineGlobals.projection_matrix.m[2][2] = -0.999999f; // Setting this to -1.0f causes D3D to complain about WNear calculation.
1813  EngineGlobals.projection_matrix.m[3][2] = 0.0f;
1814  }
1815 
1816  D3DDevice_SetTransform( D3DTS_WORLD, &EngineGlobals.world_matrix );
1817  D3DDevice_SetTransform( D3DTS_VIEW, &EngineGlobals.view_matrix );
1818  D3DDevice_SetTransform( D3DTS_PROJECTION, &EngineGlobals.projection_matrix );
1819 
1820  // Set up view frustum values for bounding sphere culling.
1821  EngineGlobals.ViewFrustumTX = tanf( Mth::DegToRad( screen_angle * 0.5f ));
1822  EngineGlobals.ViewFrustumTY = -( EngineGlobals.ViewFrustumTX / aspect_ratio );
1823  EngineGlobals.ViewFrustumSX = 1.0f / sqrtf( 1.0f + 1.0f / ( EngineGlobals.ViewFrustumTX * EngineGlobals.ViewFrustumTX ));
1824  EngineGlobals.ViewFrustumSY = 1.0f / sqrtf( 1.0f + 1.0f / ( EngineGlobals.ViewFrustumTY * EngineGlobals.ViewFrustumTY ));
1825  EngineGlobals.ViewFrustumCX = 1.0f / sqrtf( 1.0f + EngineGlobals.ViewFrustumTX * EngineGlobals.ViewFrustumTX );
1826  EngineGlobals.ViewFrustumCY = 1.0f / sqrtf( 1.0f + EngineGlobals.ViewFrustumTY * EngineGlobals.ViewFrustumTY );
1827 
1828  // Set up matrix for offset bump mapping (the matrix that will be used to set the D3DTSS_BUMPENVMATnn texture states).
1829  float rotate_angle = atan2f( -EngineGlobals.cam_at.z, -EngineGlobals.cam_at.x );
1830  XGMatrixRotationY( &EngineGlobals.bump_env_matrix, rotate_angle - D3DX_PI / 2 );
1831 
1832  // Calculate vectors for billboard rendering.
1833  BillboardManager.SetCameraMatrix();
1834 }

Перекрестные ссылки NxXbox::sEngineGlobals::backbuffer_width, BillboardManager, NxXbox::sEngineGlobals::bump_env_matrix, NxXbox::sEngineGlobals::cam_at, NxXbox::sEngineGlobals::cam_position, NxXbox::sEngineGlobals::cam_up, Mth::DegToRad(), EngineGlobals, NxXbox::sEngineGlobals::far_plane, Mth::Matrix::GetAt(), Mth::Matrix::GetUp(), Mth::Vector::GetX(), Mth::Vector::GetY(), Mth::Vector::GetZ(), NxXbox::sEngineGlobals::near_plane, NxXbox::sEngineGlobals::near_plane_height, NxXbox::sEngineGlobals::near_plane_width, NxXbox::sEngineGlobals::projection_matrix, NxXbox::sEngineGlobals::screen_angle, screen_angle, NxXbox::sBillboardManager::SetCameraMatrix(), NxXbox::sEngineGlobals::view_matrix, NxXbox::sEngineGlobals::ViewFrustumCX, NxXbox::sEngineGlobals::ViewFrustumCY, NxXbox::sEngineGlobals::ViewFrustumSX, NxXbox::sEngineGlobals::ViewFrustumSY, NxXbox::sEngineGlobals::ViewFrustumTX, NxXbox::sEngineGlobals::ViewFrustumTY и NxXbox::sEngineGlobals::world_matrix.

Граф вызовов:

◆ IsVisible()

bool NxXbox::IsVisible ( Mth::Vector &  center,
float  radius 
)

См. определение в файле render.cpp строка 1845

1846 {
1847  XGVECTOR4 test_out;
1848 
1849  XGVec3Transform( &test_out, (XGVECTOR3*)&center[X], (XGMATRIX*)&EngineGlobals.view_matrix );
1850 
1851  if( -test_out.z + radius < EngineGlobals.near_plane )
1852  return false;
1853 
1854  float sx_z = EngineGlobals.ViewFrustumSX * test_out.z;
1855  float cx_x = EngineGlobals.ViewFrustumCX * test_out.x;
1856  if(( radius < sx_z - cx_x ) || ( radius < sx_z + cx_x ))
1857  return false;
1858 
1859  float sy_z = EngineGlobals.ViewFrustumSY * test_out.z;
1860  float cy_y = EngineGlobals.ViewFrustumCY * test_out.y;
1861  if(( radius < sy_z + cy_y ) || ( radius < sy_z - cy_y ))
1862  return false;
1863 
1864  return true;
1865 }

◆ set_frustum_bbox_transform()

void NxXbox::set_frustum_bbox_transform ( Mth::Matrix *  p_transform)

См. определение в файле render.cpp строка 1873

1874 {
1875  if( p_transform == NULL )
1876  {
1877  p_bbox_transform = NULL;
1878  }
1879  else
1880  {
1881  p_bbox_transform = &bbox_transform;
1882 
1883  bbox_transform.m[0][0] = ( *p_transform ).GetRight().GetX();
1884  bbox_transform.m[0][1] = ( *p_transform ).GetRight().GetY();
1885  bbox_transform.m[0][2] = ( *p_transform ).GetRight().GetZ();
1886  bbox_transform.m[0][3] = 0.0f;
1887 
1888  bbox_transform.m[1][0] = ( *p_transform ).GetUp().GetX();
1889  bbox_transform.m[1][1] = ( *p_transform ).GetUp().GetY();
1890  bbox_transform.m[1][2] = ( *p_transform ).GetUp().GetZ();
1891  bbox_transform.m[1][3] = 0.0f;
1892 
1893  bbox_transform.m[2][0] = ( *p_transform ).GetAt().GetX();
1894  bbox_transform.m[2][1] = ( *p_transform ).GetAt().GetY();
1895  bbox_transform.m[2][2] = ( *p_transform ).GetAt().GetZ();
1896  bbox_transform.m[2][3] = 0.0f;
1897 
1898  bbox_transform.m[3][0] = p_transform->GetPos().GetX();
1899  bbox_transform.m[3][1] = p_transform->GetPos().GetY();
1900  bbox_transform.m[3][2] = p_transform->GetPos().GetZ();
1901  bbox_transform.m[3][3] = 1.0f;
1902  }
1903 }

Граф вызова функции:

◆ frustum_check_sphere()

bool NxXbox::frustum_check_sphere ( D3DXVECTOR3 *  p_center,
float  radius 
)

См. определение в файле render.cpp строка 1930

1931 {
1932  XGVECTOR4 test_out;
1933 
1934  // Build the composite transform if required.
1935  if( p_bbox_transform )
1936  {
1937  // Object to world.
1938  test_out.x = p_center->x + p_bbox_transform->_41;
1939  test_out.y = p_center->y + p_bbox_transform->_42;
1940  test_out.z = p_center->z + p_bbox_transform->_43;
1941 // XGVec3Transform( &test_out, (XGVECTOR3*)p_center, p_bbox_transform );
1942 
1943  // World to view.
1944  XGVec3Transform( &test_out, (XGVECTOR3*)&test_out, (XGMATRIX*)&EngineGlobals.view_matrix );
1945  }
1946  else
1947  {
1948  // World to view.
1949  XGVec3Transform( &test_out, (XGVECTOR3*)p_center, (XGMATRIX*)&EngineGlobals.view_matrix );
1950  }
1951 
1952  boundingSphereNearestZ = -test_out.z - radius;
1953 
1954  if( -test_out.z + radius < EngineGlobals.near_plane )
1955  return false;
1956 
1957  float sx_z = EngineGlobals.ViewFrustumSX * test_out.z;
1958  float cx_x = EngineGlobals.ViewFrustumCX * test_out.x;
1959  if(( radius < sx_z - cx_x ) || ( radius < sx_z + cx_x ))
1960  return false;
1961 
1962  float sy_z = EngineGlobals.ViewFrustumSY * test_out.z;
1963  float cy_y = EngineGlobals.ViewFrustumCY * test_out.y;
1964  if(( radius < sy_z + cy_y ) || ( radius < sy_z - cy_y ))
1965  return false;
1966 
1967  return true;
1968 }

Перекрестные ссылки boundingSphereNearestZ, EngineGlobals, NxXbox::sEngineGlobals::near_plane, p_bbox_transform, NxXbox::sEngineGlobals::view_matrix, NxXbox::sEngineGlobals::ViewFrustumCX, NxXbox::sEngineGlobals::ViewFrustumCY, NxXbox::sEngineGlobals::ViewFrustumSX и NxXbox::sEngineGlobals::ViewFrustumSY.

Используется в Nx::CXboxImposterGroup::plat_check_distance(), render_instance(), render_scene(), render_shadow_meshes(), render_shadow_volumes() и NxXbox::sMesh::Submit().

Граф вызова функции:

◆ frustum_check_box()

bool NxXbox::frustum_check_box ( Mth::CBBox *  p_bbox)

См. определение в файле render.cpp строка 1979

1980 {
1981  XGVECTOR3 test_in, test_out;
1982  XGVECTOR4 test_mid;
1983 
1984  uint32 cumulative_projection_space_outcode = 0xFF;
1985  float min_x = p_bbox->GetMin().GetX();
1986  float min_y = p_bbox->GetMin().GetY();
1987  float min_z = p_bbox->GetMin().GetZ();
1988  float max_x = p_bbox->GetMax().GetX();
1989  float max_y = p_bbox->GetMax().GetY();
1990  float max_z = p_bbox->GetMax().GetZ();
1991 
1992  for( uint32 v = 0; v < 8; ++v )
1993  {
1994  uint32 projection_space_outcode = 0;
1995 
1996  test_in.x = ( v & 0x04 ) ? max_x : min_x;
1997  test_in.y = ( v & 0x02 ) ? max_y : min_y;
1998  test_in.z = ( v & 0x01 ) ? max_z : min_z;
1999 
2000  if( p_bbox_transform )
2001  {
2002  XGVec3Transform( &test_mid, &test_in, p_bbox_transform );
2003  test_in.x = test_mid.x;
2004  test_in.y = test_mid.y;
2005  test_in.z = test_mid.z;
2006  }
2007 
2008  XGVec3Transform( &test_mid, &test_in, &EngineGlobals.view_matrix );
2009  test_in.x = test_mid.x;
2010  test_in.y = test_mid.y;
2011  test_in.z = test_mid.z;
2012 
2013  // Do z-checking here.
2014  if( -test_mid.z < EngineGlobals.near_plane )
2015  {
2016  // Behind the camera near plane.
2017  projection_space_outcode |= 0x10;
2018  }
2019  else if( -test_mid.z > EngineGlobals.far_plane )
2020  {
2021  // Beyond the camera far plane.
2022  projection_space_outcode |= 0x20;
2023  }
2024 
2025  // At this point it's important to check to see whether the point is in postive or negative z-space, since
2026  // after the projection transform, both very large camera space z values and camera space z values where z < 0
2027  // will give results with z > 1. (Camera space values in the range [0,near] give negative projection space z values).
2028  XGVec3TransformCoord( &test_out, &test_in, &EngineGlobals.projection_matrix );
2029 
2030  if(( -test_mid.z < 0.0f ) && ( !EngineGlobals.is_orthographic ))
2031  {
2032  test_out.x = -test_out.x;
2033  test_out.y = -test_out.y;
2034  }
2035 
2036  if( test_out.x > 1.0f )
2037  projection_space_outcode |= 0x01;
2038  else if( test_out.x < -1.0f )
2039  projection_space_outcode |= 0x02;
2040 
2041  if( test_out.y > 1.0f )
2042  projection_space_outcode |= 0x04;
2043  else if( test_out.y < -1.0f )
2044  projection_space_outcode |= 0x08;
2045 
2046  cumulative_projection_space_outcode &= projection_space_outcode;
2047 
2048  if( cumulative_projection_space_outcode == 0 )
2049  {
2050  // Early out.
2051  return true;
2052  }
2053  }
2054  return false;
2055 }

Перекрестные ссылки EngineGlobals, NxXbox::sEngineGlobals::far_plane, Mth::CBBox::GetMax(), Mth::CBBox::GetMin(), Mth::Vector::GetX(), Mth::Vector::GetY(), Mth::Vector::GetZ(), NxXbox::sEngineGlobals::is_orthographic, NxXbox::sEngineGlobals::near_plane, p_bbox_transform, NxXbox::sEngineGlobals::projection_matrix и NxXbox::sEngineGlobals::view_matrix.

Граф вызовов:

◆ calculate_tex_proj_matrix()

void NxXbox::calculate_tex_proj_matrix ( XGMATRIX *  p_tex_view_matrix,
XGMATRIX *  p_tex_proj_matrix,
XGMATRIX *  p_tex_transform_matrix,
XGMATRIX *  p_world_matrix 
)

См. определение в файле render.cpp строка 2074

2075 {
2076  // Get the current view matrix.
2077  XGMATRIX matView, matInvView;
2078  D3DDevice_GetTransform( D3DTS_VIEW, (XGMATRIX*)&matView );
2079  XGMatrixInverse( &matInvView, NULL, &matView );
2080 
2081  XGMATRIX matBiasScale;
2082  XGMatrixIdentity( &matBiasScale );
2083 
2084  static float x0 = 256.0f;
2085  static float y0 = 256.0f;
2086 
2087  matBiasScale._11 = x0 * 0.5f;
2088  matBiasScale._22 = y0 * -0.5f;
2089  matBiasScale._33 = D3DZ_MAX_D24S8;
2090 
2091  static float x1 = 256.0f;
2092  static float y1 = 256.0f;
2093 
2094  matBiasScale._41 = x1 * 0.5f + 0.5f;
2095  matBiasScale._42 = y1 * 0.5f + 0.5f;
2096 
2097  XGMATRIX m_matTexProj;
2098 
2099  // Don't bother with inverse view transform for Shadow Buffer, since we are picking up world-space coordinates directly.
2100  if( p_world_matrix )
2101  {
2102  m_matTexProj = *p_world_matrix; // Transform to world space.
2103  XGMatrixMultiply( &m_matTexProj, &m_matTexProj, p_tex_view_matrix ); // Transform to projection camera space.
2104  }
2105  else
2106  {
2107  m_matTexProj = *p_tex_view_matrix; // Transform to projection camera space.
2108  }
2109  XGMatrixMultiply( &m_matTexProj, &m_matTexProj, p_tex_proj_matrix ); // Situate verts relative to projector's view
2110  XGMatrixMultiply( p_tex_transform_matrix, &m_matTexProj, &matBiasScale ); // Scale and bias to map the near clipping plane to texcoords
2111 }

Используется в NxXbox::CInstance::Render() и render_shadow_meshes().

Граф вызова функции:

◆ render_shadow_targets()

void NxXbox::render_shadow_targets ( void  )

См. определение в файле render.cpp строка 2119

2120 {
2121  XGMATRIX stored_view_matrix = EngineGlobals.view_matrix;
2122  XGMATRIX stored_projection_matrix = EngineGlobals.projection_matrix;
2123  uint32 stored_fog_state = EngineGlobals.fog_enabled;
2124  DWORD multisample_mode;
2125 
2126  // Get multisample mode.
2127  D3DDevice_GetRenderState( D3DRS_MULTISAMPLEMODE, &multisample_mode );
2128 
2129  // Disable fogging.
2130  set_render_state( RS_FOGENABLE, 0 );
2131 
2132  // Goes through the list of render target textures, rendering to each one in turn.
2133  pTextureProjectionDetailsTable->IterateStart();
2134  sTextureProjectionDetails *p_details = pTextureProjectionDetailsTable->IterateNext();
2135 
2136  D3DSurface fake_target;
2137 
2138  while( p_details )
2139  {
2140  if( p_details->p_model )
2141  {
2142  // Setup dummy color buffer (bad things will happen if you write to it).
2143  // The XGSetSurfaceHeader() function is slow, these values are now set explicitly from the observed values
2144  // set by the function.
2145 // ZeroMemory( &fake_target, sizeof( fake_target ));
2146 // XGSetSurfaceHeader( 256, 256, D3DFMT_LIN_R5G6B5, &fake_target, 0, 0 );
2147  fake_target.Common = 0x00050001UL;
2148  fake_target.Data = 0x00000000UL;
2149  fake_target.Lock = 0x00000000UL;
2150  fake_target.Format = 0x00011129UL;
2151  fake_target.Size = 0x070FF0FFUL;
2152  fake_target.Parent = 0x00000000UL;
2153 
2154  // Set the new render target.
2155  LPDIRECT3DSURFACE8 pSurface;
2156 
2157  // This call will increase the reference count of the IDirect3DTexture8 object.
2158  p_details->p_texture->pD3DTexture->GetSurfaceLevel( 0, &pSurface );
2159 
2160  // This call will increase the reference count of the IDirect3DSurface8 object.
2161  D3DDevice_SetRenderTarget( &fake_target, pSurface );
2162 
2163  // Clear the target.
2164  D3DDevice_Clear( 0, NULL, D3DCLEAR_ZBUFFER | D3DCLEAR_STENCIL, 0, 1.0f, 0 );
2165 
2166  // Disable color writes.
2167  D3DDevice_SetRenderState( D3DRS_COLORWRITEENABLE, 0 );
2168 
2169  // Turn on z-offset.
2170  D3DDevice_SetRenderState( D3DRS_SOLIDOFFSETENABLE, TRUE );
2171  D3DDevice_SetRenderState( D3DRS_POLYGONOFFSETZOFFSET, FtoDW( 4.0f ));
2172  D3DDevice_SetRenderState( D3DRS_POLYGONOFFSETZSLOPESCALE, FtoDW( 2.0f ));
2173 
2174  // Performance optimiser suggested change.
2175  // Priority 2: Set D3DRS_MULTISAMPLEMODE to D3DMULTISAMPLEMODE_4X for faster fill rate with no quality loss when depth only rendering.
2176  D3DDevice_SetRenderState( D3DRS_MULTISAMPLEMODE, D3DMULTISAMPLEMODE_4X );
2177 
2178  // Set the view and projection transforms.
2179  EngineGlobals.view_matrix = p_details->view_matrix;
2180  EngineGlobals.projection_matrix = p_details->projection_matrix;
2181  EngineGlobals.is_orthographic = true;
2182 
2183  // Render all instances for the CGeom's contained in this model.
2184  int num_geoms = p_details->p_model->GetNumGeoms();
2185  for( int i = 0; i < num_geoms; ++i )
2186  {
2187  Nx::CXboxGeom *p_xbox_geom = static_cast<Nx::CXboxGeom*>( p_details->p_model->GetGeomByIndex( i ));
2188  CInstance *p_instance = p_xbox_geom->GetInstance();
2189 
2190  if( p_instance->GetActive())
2191  {
2192  // Flag the scene as having the shadow version rendered.
2193  p_instance->GetScene()->m_flags |= SCENE_FLAG_RENDERING_SHADOW;
2194 
2195  // Render the model.
2196  render_instance( p_instance, vRENDER_NO_CULLING );
2197 
2198  // Clear the flag the scene as having the shadow version rendered.
2199  p_instance->GetScene()->m_flags &= ~SCENE_FLAG_RENDERING_SHADOW;
2200 
2201  // Flag the scene as self shadowing.
2202  p_instance->GetScene()->m_flags |= SCENE_FLAG_SELF_SHADOWS;
2203  }
2204  }
2205  pSurface->Release();
2206  }
2207  p_details = pTextureProjectionDetailsTable->IterateNext();
2208  }
2209 
2210  // Restore important states.
2211  D3DDevice_SetRenderState( D3DRS_COLORWRITEENABLE, D3DCOLORWRITEENABLE_ALL );
2212  D3DDevice_SetRenderState( D3DRS_SOLIDOFFSETENABLE, FALSE );
2213  D3DDevice_SetRenderState( D3DRS_MULTISAMPLEMODE, multisample_mode );
2214  set_render_state( RS_FOGENABLE, stored_fog_state );
2215 
2216  // Pixel shader override no longer required.
2217  EngineGlobals.pixel_shader_override = 0;
2218 
2219  // Restore the view and projection transforms.
2220  EngineGlobals.view_matrix = stored_view_matrix;
2221  EngineGlobals.projection_matrix = stored_projection_matrix;
2222  EngineGlobals.is_orthographic = false;
2223 
2224  // It's important to set the internal reference count of the dummy color surface here, otherwise
2225  // the debug version of D3D will complain when it attempts to reduce the internal ref count during
2226  // the subsequent SetRenderTarget() call.
2227  fake_target.Common = 0x000D0001UL;
2228 
2229  // Restore the default render target.
2230  D3DDevice_SetRenderTarget( EngineGlobals.p_RenderSurface, EngineGlobals.p_ZStencilSurface );
2231 }

Перекрестные ссылки EngineGlobals, NxXbox::sEngineGlobals::fog_enabled, FtoDW(), NxXbox::CInstance::GetActive(), Nx::CModel::GetGeomByIndex(), Nx::CXboxGeom::GetInstance(), Nx::CModel::GetNumGeoms(), NxXbox::CInstance::GetScene(), NxXbox::sEngineGlobals::is_orthographic, NxXbox::sScene::m_flags, NxXbox::sTextureProjectionDetails::p_model, NxXbox::sEngineGlobals::p_RenderSurface, NxXbox::sTextureProjectionDetails::p_texture, NxXbox::sEngineGlobals::p_ZStencilSurface, NxXbox::sTexture::pD3DTexture, NxXbox::sEngineGlobals::pixel_shader_override, NxXbox::sEngineGlobals::projection_matrix, NxXbox::sTextureProjectionDetails::projection_matrix, pTextureProjectionDetailsTable, render_instance(), set_render_state(), NxXbox::sEngineGlobals::view_matrix, NxXbox::sTextureProjectionDetails::view_matrix и vRENDER_NO_CULLING.

Граф вызовов:

◆ render_shadow_meshes()

void NxXbox::render_shadow_meshes ( sScene *  p_scene,
sMesh **  p_mesh_indices,
int  num_meshes 
)

См. определение в файле render.cpp строка 2239

2240 {
2241  // No anisotropic filtering for the base texture.
2242  DWORD stage_zero_minfilter;
2243  D3DDevice_GetTextureStageState( 0, D3DTSS_MINFILTER, &stage_zero_minfilter );
2244  D3DDevice_SetTextureStageState( 0, D3DTSS_MINFILTER, D3DTEXF_LINEAR );
2245 
2246  // Disable fogging.
2247  uint32 stored_fog_state = EngineGlobals.fog_enabled;
2248  set_render_state( RS_FOGENABLE, 0 );
2249 
2250  // Scan through each entry in the TextureProjectionDetails table, and see whether it relates to this scene.
2251  pTextureProjectionDetailsTable->IterateStart();
2252  sTextureProjectionDetails *p_details = pTextureProjectionDetailsTable->IterateNext();
2253  while( p_details )
2254  {
2255  XGMATRIX stored_view_matrix = EngineGlobals.view_matrix;
2256  XGMATRIX stored_projection_matrix = EngineGlobals.projection_matrix;
2257 
2258  // Calculate the projection matrix that will project world coordinates into our shadow buffer.
2259  calculate_tex_proj_matrix( &p_details->view_matrix, &p_details->projection_matrix, &p_details->texture_projection_matrix );
2260 
2261  // Set the vertex shader.
2262  set_vertex_shader( ShadowBufferStaticGeomVS );
2263 
2264  // Set the pixel shader that just does straight texturing.
2265  set_pixel_shader( ShadowBufferStaticGeomPS );
2266 
2267  set_render_state( RS_ALPHACUTOFF, 1 );
2268 
2269  // Set the other textures to NULL.
2270  set_texture( 0, NULL );
2271  set_texture( 2, NULL );
2272  set_texture( 3, NULL );
2273 
2274  // Need to set this texture NULL first, to flush the texture state, since the incoming texture is linear.
2275  set_texture( 1, NULL );
2276 
2277  // Set the projected texture (as the second-pass texture).
2278  if( p_details->p_texture->pD3DSurface )
2279  set_texture( 1, (IDirect3DTexture8*)( p_details->p_texture->pD3DSurface ));
2280  else
2281  set_texture( 1, p_details->p_texture->pD3DTexture );
2282 
2283  // Set shadowbuffer texture details.
2284  set_render_state( RS_UVADDRESSMODE1, 0x00020002UL ); // Set (border,border) addressing.
2285  D3DDevice_SetTextureStageState( 1, D3DTSS_BORDERCOLOR, 0xffffffff );
2286  D3DDevice_SetTextureStageState( 1, D3DTSS_MAGFILTER, D3DTEXF_LINEAR );
2287  D3DDevice_SetTextureStageState( 1, D3DTSS_MINFILTER, D3DTEXF_LINEAR );
2288 
2289  // Set shadowbuffer state.
2290  D3DDevice_SetRenderState( D3DRS_SHADOWFUNC, D3DCMP_GREATEREQUAL );
2291 
2292  // Upload constants to the vertex shader for composite world->view->projection transform (c0 - c3) and
2293  // world->texture transform (c4 - c7).
2294  XGMATRIX dest_matrix;
2295  XGMATRIX temp_matrix;
2296  XGMATRIX projMatrix;
2297  XGMATRIX viewMatrix;
2298  XGMATRIX worldMatrix;
2299  XGMATRIX texProjMatrix;
2300 
2301  // Texture projection matrix.
2302  XGMatrixTranspose( &texProjMatrix, &p_details->texture_projection_matrix );
2303 
2304  // Projection matrix.
2305  XGMatrixTranspose( &projMatrix, &EngineGlobals.projection_matrix );
2306 
2307  // View matrix.
2308  XGMatrixTranspose( &viewMatrix, &EngineGlobals.view_matrix );
2309  viewMatrix.m[3][0] = 0.0f;
2310  viewMatrix.m[3][1] = 0.0f;
2311  viewMatrix.m[3][2] = 0.0f;
2312  viewMatrix.m[3][3] = 1.0f;
2313 
2314  // World space transformation matrix.
2315  XGMatrixIdentity( &worldMatrix );
2316 
2317  // Calculate composite world->view->projection matrix.
2318  XGMatrixMultiply( &temp_matrix, &viewMatrix, &worldMatrix );
2319  XGMatrixMultiply( &dest_matrix, &projMatrix, &temp_matrix );
2320 
2321  // Load up the combined world, camera & projection matrix, and the tetxure transform matrix.
2322  D3DDevice_SetVertexShaderConstantFast( 0, (void*)&dest_matrix, 4 );
2323  D3DDevice_SetVertexShaderConstantFast( 4, (void*)&texProjMatrix, 4 );
2324 
2325  // Turn on z-offset.
2326  D3DDevice_SetRenderState( D3DRS_SOLIDOFFSETENABLE, TRUE );
2327  D3DDevice_SetRenderState( D3DRS_POLYGONOFFSETZOFFSET, FtoDW( -4.0f ));
2328  D3DDevice_SetRenderState( D3DRS_POLYGONOFFSETZSLOPESCALE, FtoDW( -2.0f ));
2329 
2330  // Set the blend mode to modulate, using the texture color.
2331  set_blend_mode( vBLEND_MODE_MODULATE_COLOR );
2332 
2333  // Set up the correct view and projection matrix for frustum culling.
2334  EngineGlobals.view_matrix = p_details->view_matrix;
2335  EngineGlobals.projection_matrix = p_details->projection_matrix;
2336  EngineGlobals.is_orthographic = true;
2337 
2338  // Draw the meshes.
2339  for( int i = 0; i < num_meshes; ++i )
2340  {
2341  sMesh *p_mesh = p_mesh_indices[i];
2342 
2343  // Check this mesh is okay for shadow rendering.
2344  if( !( p_mesh->m_flags & sMesh::MESH_FLAG_NO_SKATER_SHADOW ))
2345  {
2346  // Cull this mesh against the second view frustum.
2347  if( frustum_check_sphere( &p_mesh->m_sphere_center, p_mesh->m_sphere_radius ))
2348  {
2349 // if( frustum_check_box( &p_mesh->m_bbox ))
2350  {
2351  // Here we want to set up texture 0 as per the material on the mesh. This way we can use it as an alpha
2352  // mask to avoid drawing the shadow on transparent pixels.
2353  if( p_mesh->mp_material->mp_tex[0] )
2354  {
2355  set_texture( 0, p_mesh->mp_material->mp_tex[0]->pD3DTexture );
2356  set_render_state( RS_UVADDRESSMODE0, p_mesh->mp_material->m_uv_addressing[0] );
2357  }
2358 
2359  // Draw the mesh.
2360  D3DDevice_SetStreamSource( 0, p_mesh->mp_vertex_buffer[0], p_mesh->m_vertex_stride );
2361  D3DDevice_DrawIndexedVertices( p_mesh->m_primitive_type, p_mesh->m_num_indices[0], p_mesh->mp_index_buffer[0] );
2362  }
2363  }
2364  }
2365  }
2366 
2367  // Restore the view and projection transforms.
2368  EngineGlobals.view_matrix = stored_view_matrix;
2369  EngineGlobals.projection_matrix = stored_projection_matrix;
2370  EngineGlobals.is_orthographic = false;
2371 
2372  p_details = pTextureProjectionDetailsTable->IterateNext();
2373  }
2374 
2375  // Turn off z-offset.
2376  D3DDevice_SetRenderState( D3DRS_SOLIDOFFSETENABLE, FALSE );
2377  D3DDevice_SetRenderState( D3DRS_SHADOWFUNC, D3DCMP_NEVER );
2378  set_pixel_shader( 0 );
2379 
2380  // Restore anisotropic filtering if present.
2381  D3DDevice_SetTextureStageState( 0, D3DTSS_MINFILTER, stage_zero_minfilter );
2382 
2383  // Restore fogging if present.
2384  set_render_state( RS_FOGENABLE, stored_fog_state );
2385 
2386  // Reflush linear texture.
2387  set_texture( 1, NULL );
2388 }

Перекрестные ссылки calculate_tex_proj_matrix(), EngineGlobals, NxXbox::sEngineGlobals::fog_enabled, frustum_check_sphere(), FtoDW(), NxXbox::sEngineGlobals::is_orthographic, NxXbox::sMesh::m_flags, NxXbox::sMesh::m_num_indices, NxXbox::sMesh::m_primitive_type, NxXbox::sMesh::m_sphere_center, NxXbox::sMesh::m_sphere_radius, NxXbox::sMaterial::m_uv_addressing, NxXbox::sMesh::m_vertex_stride, NxXbox::sMesh::MESH_FLAG_NO_SKATER_SHADOW, NxXbox::sMesh::mp_index_buffer, NxXbox::sMesh::mp_material, NxXbox::sMaterial::mp_tex, NxXbox::sMesh::mp_vertex_buffer, NxXbox::sTextureProjectionDetails::p_texture, NxXbox::sTexture::pD3DSurface, NxXbox::sTexture::pD3DTexture, NxXbox::sEngineGlobals::projection_matrix, NxXbox::sTextureProjectionDetails::projection_matrix, pTextureProjectionDetailsTable, set_blend_mode(), set_pixel_shader(), set_render_state(), set_texture(), set_vertex_shader(), ShadowBufferStaticGeomPS, ShadowBufferStaticGeomVS, NxXbox::sTextureProjectionDetails::texture_projection_matrix, vBLEND_MODE_MODULATE_COLOR, NxXbox::sEngineGlobals::view_matrix и NxXbox::sTextureProjectionDetails::view_matrix.

Используется в render_scene().

◆ cmp() [2/2]

static int NxXbox::cmp ( const void *  p1,
const void *  p2 
)
static

2397  return((sSortedMeshEntry*)p1)->sort < ((sSortedMeshEntry*)p2)->sort ? -1 : ((sSortedMeshEntry*)p1)->sort > ((sSortedMeshEntry*)p2)->sort ? 1 : 0;

◆ render_shadow_volumes()

void NxXbox::render_shadow_volumes ( sScene *  p_scene,
uint32  viewport 
)

См. определение в файле render.cpp строка 2408

2409 {
2410  // Switch viewport from value to bitfield value.
2411  viewport = ( 1 << viewport );
2412 
2413  NxXbox::set_pixel_shader( PixelShader5 );
2414  EngineGlobals.pixel_shader_override = PixelShader5;
2415  NxXbox::set_texture( 0, NULL );
2416  NxXbox::set_render_state( RS_ZWRITEENABLE, 0 );
2417  NxXbox::set_render_state( RS_ZTESTENABLE, 1 );
2418  NxXbox::set_render_state( RS_ALPHACUTOFF, 0 );
2419 
2420  if( debug_shadow_volumes == false )
2421  D3DDevice_SetRenderState( D3DRS_ZFUNC, D3DCMP_GREATEREQUAL );
2422 
2423  // Render all meshes.
2424  for( int e = 0; e < p_scene->m_num_mesh_entries; ++e )
2425  {
2426  sMesh *p_mesh = p_scene->m_meshes[e];
2427  if(( p_mesh->m_flags & sMesh::MESH_FLAG_ACTIVE ) && ( p_mesh->m_flags & sMesh::MESH_FLAG_SHADOW_VOLUME ))
2428  {
2429  // Frustum cull this mesh, using the associated bounding sphere.
2430  if( frustum_check_sphere( &p_mesh->m_sphere_center, p_mesh->m_sphere_radius ))
2431  {
2432  if( debug_shadow_volumes == false )
2433  {
2434  NxXbox::set_render_state( RS_CULLMODE, D3DCULL_CW );
2435  NxXbox::set_blend_mode( 0x10000000UL | NxXbox::vBLEND_MODE_ADD_FIXED );
2436  p_mesh->Submit();
2437 
2438  NxXbox::set_render_state( RS_CULLMODE, D3DCULL_CCW );
2439  NxXbox::set_blend_mode( 0x10000000UL | NxXbox::vBLEND_MODE_SUB_FIXED );
2440  p_mesh->Submit();
2441  }
2442  else
2443  {
2444  NxXbox::set_render_state( RS_CULLMODE, D3DCULL_NONE );
2445  NxXbox::set_blend_mode( 0x30000000UL | NxXbox::vBLEND_MODE_BLEND_FIXED );
2446  p_mesh->Submit();
2447  }
2448  }
2449  }
2450  }
2451 
2452  EngineGlobals.pixel_shader_override = 0;
2453  NxXbox::set_render_state( RS_ZWRITEENABLE, 1 );
2454  NxXbox::set_render_state( RS_CULLMODE, D3DCULL_CW );
2455  D3DDevice_SetRenderState( D3DRS_ZFUNC, D3DCMP_LESSEQUAL );
2456 }

Перекрестные ссылки debug_shadow_volumes, EngineGlobals, frustum_check_sphere(), NxXbox::sMesh::m_flags, NxXbox::sScene::m_meshes, NxXbox::sScene::m_num_mesh_entries, NxXbox::sMesh::m_sphere_center, NxXbox::sMesh::m_sphere_radius, NxXbox::sMesh::MESH_FLAG_ACTIVE, NxXbox::sMesh::MESH_FLAG_SHADOW_VOLUME, NxXbox::sEngineGlobals::pixel_shader_override, PixelShader5, set_blend_mode(), set_pixel_shader(), set_render_state(), set_texture(), NxXbox::sMesh::Submit(), vBLEND_MODE_ADD_FIXED, vBLEND_MODE_BLEND_FIXED и vBLEND_MODE_SUB_FIXED.

Используется в render_scene().

Граф вызовов:
Граф вызова функции:

◆ render_scene()

void NxXbox::render_scene ( sScene *  p_scene,
uint32  flags,
uint32  viewport 
)

См. определение в файле render.cpp строка 2466

2467 {
2468  sMaterial *p_material = NULL;
2469  bool no_culling = ( flags & vRENDER_NO_CULLING ) > 0 ;
2470  bool render;
2471  int visible_mesh_array_index = 0;
2472 
2473  // Don't render dictionary scenes.
2474  if( p_scene->m_is_dictionary )
2475  {
2476  return;
2477  }
2478 
2479  if( flags & vRENDER_SHADOW_VOLUMES )
2480  {
2481  render_shadow_volumes( p_scene, viewport );
2482  return;
2483  }
2484 
2485  // Disallow front to back sorting if the number of opaque meshes is larger than the visible mesh array.
2486  if( p_scene->m_first_semitransparent_entry >= VISIBLE_MESH_ARRAY_SIZE )
2487  {
2488  flags &= ~vRENDER_SORT_FRONT_TO_BACK;
2489  }
2490 
2491  // Switch viewport from value to bitfield value.
2492  viewport = ( 1 << viewport );
2493 
2494  // Render opaque meshes.
2495  if( flags & vRENDER_OPAQUE )
2496  {
2497  for( int e = 0; e < p_scene->m_first_semitransparent_entry; ++e )
2498  {
2499  sMesh *p_mesh = p_scene->m_meshes[e];
2500 
2501  __asm mov eax, p_mesh // Store mesh pointer.
2502  __asm prefetcht0 [eax] // Get first 32 bytes of sMesh structure.
2503 
2504  if(( p_mesh->m_flags & sMesh::MESH_FLAG_ACTIVE ) && (( p_mesh->m_flags & ( sMesh::MESH_FLAG_SHADOW_VOLUME | sMesh::MESH_FLAG_BILLBOARD )) == 0 ))
2505  {
2506  if( no_culling )
2507  {
2508  render = true;
2509  }
2510  else
2511  {
2512  render = false;
2513 
2514  // Check the visibility mask.
2515  if( p_mesh->m_visibility_mask & viewport )
2516  {
2517  // Frustum cull this set of meshes, using the associated bounding sphere and bounding box.
2518  if( frustum_check_sphere( &p_mesh->m_sphere_center, p_mesh->m_sphere_radius ))
2519  {
2520  // Check against any occluders.
2521  if(( !( flags & vRENDER_OCCLUDED )) || ( !TestSphereAgainstOccluders( &p_mesh->m_sphere_center, p_mesh->m_sphere_radius )))
2522  {
2523  render = true;
2524  }
2525  }
2526  }
2527  }
2528 
2529  // Draw this mesh if we decided it is visible.
2530  if( render )
2531  {
2532  if(( flags & vRENDER_SORT_FRONT_TO_BACK ) == 0 )
2533  {
2534  // If the material has changed, submit the new material.
2535  if( p_mesh->mp_material != p_material )
2536  {
2537  p_material = p_mesh->mp_material;
2538  p_material->Submit();
2539  }
2540  p_mesh->Submit();
2541  }
2542  else
2543  {
2544  // If this mesh is within the 'near' section, render it now. Meshes in the far section will be
2545  // deferred for rendering later on, which should gain some benefit from the fast pixel occlusion.
2546  if( boundingSphereNearestZ <= FRONT_TO_BACK_SORT_CUTOFF )
2547  {
2548  if( p_mesh->mp_material != p_material )
2549  {
2550  p_material = p_mesh->mp_material;
2551  p_material->Submit();
2552  }
2553  p_mesh->Submit();
2554  }
2555 
2556  // Set the nearest point of the bounding sphere.
2557  p_mesh->m_bounding_sphere_nearest_z = boundingSphereNearestZ;
2558  }
2559 
2560  // Add this mesh to the visible list, providing it is within bounds.
2561  visible_mesh_array[visible_mesh_array_index] = p_mesh;
2562  if( visible_mesh_array_index < ( VISIBLE_MESH_ARRAY_SIZE - 1 ))
2563  ++visible_mesh_array_index;
2564  }
2565  }
2566  }
2567 
2568  if(( flags & vRENDER_SORT_FRONT_TO_BACK ) && ( visible_mesh_array_index > 0 ))
2569  {
2570  // At this stage we have an array of meshes, some of which may not yet have been rendered.
2571  // At this point simply scan through the list twice, drawing all 'far' meshes.
2572  for( int vm = 0; vm < visible_mesh_array_index; ++vm )
2573  {
2574  sMesh *p_sorted_mesh = visible_mesh_array[vm];
2575 
2576  if( p_sorted_mesh->m_bounding_sphere_nearest_z > FRONT_TO_BACK_SORT_CUTOFF )
2577  {
2578  // If the material has changed, submit the new material.
2579  if( p_sorted_mesh->mp_material != p_material )
2580  {
2581  p_material = p_sorted_mesh->mp_material;
2582  p_material->Submit();
2583  }
2584  p_sorted_mesh->Submit();
2585  }
2586  }
2587  }
2588 
2589  // Now draw the opaque meshes with shadow mapped on them.
2590  if( p_scene->m_flags & SCENE_FLAG_RECEIVE_SHADOWS )
2591  {
2592  set_render_state( RS_ZWRITEENABLE, 0 );
2593  DWORD min_filter;
2594  D3DDevice_GetTextureStageState( 0, D3DTSS_MINFILTER, &min_filter );
2595  if( min_filter == D3DTEXF_ANISOTROPIC )
2596  {
2597  D3DDevice_SetTextureStageState( 0, D3DTSS_MINFILTER, D3DTEXF_LINEAR );
2598  }
2599 
2600  render_shadow_meshes( p_scene, visible_mesh_array, visible_mesh_array_index );
2601 
2602  if( min_filter == D3DTEXF_ANISOTROPIC )
2603  {
2604  D3DDevice_SetTextureStageState( 0, D3DTSS_MINFILTER, D3DTEXF_ANISOTROPIC );
2605  }
2606  set_render_state( RS_ZWRITEENABLE, 1 );
2607  }
2608 
2609  // Reset mesh array
2610  visible_mesh_array_index = 0;
2611 
2612  if( flags & vRENDER_BILLBOARDS )
2613  {
2614  BillboardManager.Render( vRENDER_OPAQUE );
2615  }
2616  }
2617 
2618  if( flags & vRENDER_SEMITRANSPARENT )
2619  {
2620  int e = p_scene->m_first_semitransparent_entry;
2621  int next_sorted_mesh_entry = 0;
2622 
2623  // Semitransparent rendering is done in three stages.
2624  // The first stage is meshes in the list up to the point where dynamic sorting starts.
2625  // The second stage is meshes in the list which use dynamic sorting.
2626  // The third stage is meshes in the list beyond the point where dynamic sorting ends.
2627  for( ; e < p_scene->m_first_dynamic_sort_entry; ++e )
2628  {
2629  sMesh *p_mesh = p_scene->m_meshes[e];
2630 
2631  __asm mov eax, p_mesh // Store mesh pointer.
2632  __asm prefetcht0 [eax] // Get first 32 bytes of sMesh structure.
2633 
2634  if(( p_mesh->m_flags & sMesh::MESH_FLAG_ACTIVE ) && (( p_mesh->m_flags & ( sMesh::MESH_FLAG_SHADOW_VOLUME | sMesh::MESH_FLAG_BILLBOARD )) == 0 ))
2635  {
2636  if( no_culling )
2637  {
2638  render = true;
2639  }
2640  else
2641  {
2642  render = false;
2643 
2644  // Check the visibility mask.
2645  if( p_mesh->m_visibility_mask & viewport )
2646  {
2647  // Frustum cull this set of meshes, using the associated bounding box.
2648  if( frustum_check_sphere( &p_mesh->m_sphere_center, p_mesh->m_sphere_radius ))
2649  {
2650  // Check against any occluders.
2651  if(( !( flags & vRENDER_OCCLUDED )) || ( !TestSphereAgainstOccluders( &p_mesh->m_sphere_center, p_mesh->m_sphere_radius )))
2652  {
2653  render = true;
2654  }
2655  }
2656  }
2657  }
2658  if( render )
2659  {
2660  // If the material has changed, submit the new material.
2661  if( p_mesh->mp_material != p_material )
2662  {
2663  p_material = p_mesh->mp_material;
2664  p_material->Submit();
2665  }
2666  p_mesh->Submit();
2667 
2668  // Add this mesh to the visible list, providing it is within bounds.
2669  visible_mesh_array[visible_mesh_array_index] = p_mesh;
2670  if( visible_mesh_array_index < ( VISIBLE_MESH_ARRAY_SIZE - 1 ))
2671  ++visible_mesh_array_index;
2672  }
2673  }
2674  }
2675 
2676  if( p_scene->m_num_dynamic_sort_entries > 0 )
2677  {
2678  // Second stage - dynamically sorted meshes.
2679  int last_dynamic_sort_entry = p_scene->m_first_dynamic_sort_entry + p_scene->m_num_dynamic_sort_entries;
2680  for( ; e < last_dynamic_sort_entry; ++e )
2681  {
2682  sMesh *p_mesh = p_scene->m_meshes[e];
2683 
2684  __asm mov eax, p_mesh // Store mesh pointer.
2685  __asm prefetcht0 [eax] // Get first 32 bytes of sMesh structure.
2686 
2687  if(( p_mesh->m_flags & sMesh::MESH_FLAG_ACTIVE ) && (( p_mesh->m_flags & ( sMesh::MESH_FLAG_SHADOW_VOLUME | sMesh::MESH_FLAG_BILLBOARD )) == 0 ))
2688  {
2689  if( no_culling )
2690  {
2691  render = true;
2692  }
2693  else
2694  {
2695  render = false;
2696 
2697  // Check the visibility mask.
2698  if( p_mesh->m_visibility_mask & viewport )
2699  {
2700  // Frustum cull this set of meshes, using the associated bounding box.
2701  if( frustum_check_sphere( &p_mesh->m_sphere_center, p_mesh->m_sphere_radius ))
2702  {
2703  // Check against any occluders.
2704  if(( !( flags & vRENDER_OCCLUDED )) || ( !TestSphereAgainstOccluders( &p_mesh->m_sphere_center, p_mesh->m_sphere_radius )))
2705  {
2706  render = true;
2707  }
2708  }
2709  }
2710  }
2711  if( render )
2712  {
2713  // Add this mesh to the visible list, providing it is within bounds.
2714  visible_mesh_array[visible_mesh_array_index] = p_mesh;
2715  if( visible_mesh_array_index < ( VISIBLE_MESH_ARRAY_SIZE - 1 ))
2716  ++visible_mesh_array_index;
2717 
2718  sortedMeshArray[next_sorted_mesh_entry].p_mesh = p_mesh;
2719  sortedMeshArray[next_sorted_mesh_entry].sort = boundingSphereNearestZ;
2720 
2721  ++next_sorted_mesh_entry;
2722  }
2723  }
2724  }
2725  if( next_sorted_mesh_entry > 0 )
2726  {
2727  // Sort the array into ascending sort order.
2728  qsort( sortedMeshArray, next_sorted_mesh_entry, sizeof( sSortedMeshEntry ), cmp );
2729 
2730  for( int m = 0; m < next_sorted_mesh_entry; ++m )
2731  {
2732  if( sortedMeshArray[m].p_mesh->mp_material != p_material )
2733  {
2734  sortedMeshArray[m].p_mesh->mp_material->Submit();
2735  p_material = sortedMeshArray[m].p_mesh->mp_material;
2736  }
2737  sortedMeshArray[m].p_mesh->Submit();
2738  }
2739  }
2740 
2741  // Third stage - meshes after the dynamically sorted set.
2742  for( ; e < p_scene->m_num_mesh_entries; ++e )
2743  {
2744  sMesh *p_mesh = p_scene->m_meshes[e];
2745 
2746  __asm mov eax, p_mesh // Store mesh pointer.
2747  __asm prefetcht0 [eax] // Get first 32 bytes of sMesh structure.
2748 
2749  if(( p_mesh->m_flags & sMesh::MESH_FLAG_ACTIVE ) && (( p_mesh->m_flags & ( sMesh::MESH_FLAG_SHADOW_VOLUME | sMesh::MESH_FLAG_BILLBOARD )) == 0 ))
2750  {
2751  if( no_culling )
2752  {
2753  render = true;
2754  }
2755  else
2756  {
2757  render = false;
2758 
2759  // Check the visibility mask.
2760  if( p_mesh->m_visibility_mask & viewport )
2761  {
2762  // Frustum cull this set of meshes, using the associated bounding box.
2763  if( frustum_check_sphere( &p_mesh->m_sphere_center, p_mesh->m_sphere_radius ))
2764  {
2765  // Check against any occluders.
2766  if(( !( flags & vRENDER_OCCLUDED )) || ( !TestSphereAgainstOccluders( &p_mesh->m_sphere_center, p_mesh->m_sphere_radius )))
2767  {
2768  render = true;
2769  }
2770  }
2771  }
2772  }
2773  if( render )
2774  {
2775  // If the material has changed, submit the new material.
2776  if( p_mesh->mp_material != p_material )
2777  {
2778  p_material = p_mesh->mp_material;
2779  p_material->Submit();
2780  }
2781  p_mesh->Submit();
2782 
2783  // Add this mesh to the visible list, providing it is within bounds.
2784  visible_mesh_array[visible_mesh_array_index] = p_mesh;
2785  if( visible_mesh_array_index < ( VISIBLE_MESH_ARRAY_SIZE - 1 ))
2786  ++visible_mesh_array_index;
2787  }
2788  }
2789  }
2790  }
2791 
2792  // Now draw the semitransparent meshes with shadow mapped on them.
2793  if( p_scene->m_flags & SCENE_FLAG_RECEIVE_SHADOWS )
2794  {
2795  render_shadow_meshes( p_scene, visible_mesh_array, visible_mesh_array_index );
2796  }
2797 
2798  if( flags & vRENDER_BILLBOARDS )
2799  {
2800  BillboardManager.Render( vRENDER_SEMITRANSPARENT );
2801  }
2802  }
2803 }

Перекрестные ссылки BillboardManager, boundingSphereNearestZ, cmp(), Gfx::flags, FRONT_TO_BACK_SORT_CUTOFF, frustum_check_sphere(), NxXbox::sMesh::m_bounding_sphere_nearest_z, NxXbox::sScene::m_first_dynamic_sort_entry, NxXbox::sScene::m_first_semitransparent_entry, NxXbox::sScene::m_flags, NxXbox::sMesh::m_flags, NxXbox::sScene::m_is_dictionary, NxXbox::sScene::m_meshes, NxXbox::sScene::m_num_dynamic_sort_entries, NxXbox::sScene::m_num_mesh_entries, NxXbox::sMesh::m_sphere_center, NxXbox::sMesh::m_sphere_radius, NxXbox::sMesh::m_visibility_mask, NxXbox::sMesh::MESH_FLAG_ACTIVE, NxXbox::sMesh::MESH_FLAG_BILLBOARD, NxXbox::sMesh::MESH_FLAG_SHADOW_VOLUME, NxXbox::sMesh::mp_material, NxXbox::sSortedMeshEntry::p_mesh, NxXbox::sBillboardManager::Render(), render_shadow_meshes(), render_shadow_volumes(), set_render_state(), NxXbox::sSortedMeshEntry::sort, sortedMeshArray, NxXbox::sMaterial::Submit(), NxXbox::sMesh::Submit(), TestSphereAgainstOccluders(), visible_mesh_array, vRENDER_BILLBOARDS, vRENDER_NO_CULLING, vRENDER_OCCLUDED, vRENDER_OPAQUE, vRENDER_SEMITRANSPARENT, vRENDER_SHADOW_VOLUMES и vRENDER_SORT_FRONT_TO_BACK.

Используется в NxXbox::CInstance::Render().

Граф вызовов:
Граф вызова функции:

◆ render_light_glows()

void NxXbox::render_light_glows ( bool  test)

См. определение в файле render.cpp строка 2811

2812 {
2813  struct sLightGlowVert
2814  {
2815  D3DVECTOR m_pos;
2816  D3DCOLOR m_col;
2817  };
2818 
2819  static sLightGlowVert verts[4];
2820 
2821  // This function will be called twice per render, once to test the amount of pixels drawn,
2822  // the other to actually draw the pixels.
2823 
2824  // Used to figure the right and up vectors for creating screen-aligned particle quads.
2825  D3DXMATRIX *p_matrix = (D3DXMATRIX*)&NxXbox::EngineGlobals.view_matrix;
2826 
2827  // Concatenate p_matrix with the emmission angle to create the direction.
2828  Mth::Vector up( 0.0f, 1.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f );
2829 
2830  // Get the 'right' vector as the cross product of camera 'at' and world 'up'.
2831  Mth::Vector at( p_matrix->m[0][2], p_matrix->m[1][2], p_matrix->m[2][2] );
2832  Mth::Vector screen_right = Mth::CrossProduct( at, up );
2833  Mth::Vector screen_up = Mth::CrossProduct( screen_right, at );
2834 
2835  screen_right.Normalize();
2836  screen_up.Normalize();
2837 
2838  sLightGlowDetailsTable.IterateStart();
2839  sLightGlowDetails *p_details = sLightGlowDetailsTable.IterateNext();
2840 
2841  if( test )
2842  {
2843  // Turn of z and color writes.
2844 // D3DDevice_SetRenderState( D3DRS_COLORWRITEENABLE, 0 );
2845  D3DDevice_SetRenderState( D3DRS_ZWRITEENABLE, FALSE );
2846 
2847  set_blend_mode( vBLEND_MODE_DIFFUSE );
2848  set_texture( 0, NULL );
2849  set_pixel_shader( PixelShader5 );
2850  set_vertex_shader( D3DFVF_XYZ | D3DFVF_DIFFUSE );
2851 
2852  while( p_details )
2853  {
2854  // Get a new test index.
2855  uint32 index = p_details->m_visibility_test_fifo.AddStatus();
2856 
2857  // Only do the check if there is room on the queue.
2858  if( index > 0 )
2859  {
2860  // For each light glow instance, add a render check.
2861  D3DDevice_BeginVisibilityTest();
2862 
2863  // Draw the glow.
2864  verts[0].m_pos.x = p_details->m_pos[X] - ( screen_right[X] * p_details->m_test_radius ) - ( screen_up[X] * p_details->m_test_radius );
2865  verts[0].m_pos.y = p_details->m_pos[Y] - ( screen_right[Y] * p_details->m_test_radius ) - ( screen_up[Y] * p_details->m_test_radius );
2866  verts[0].m_pos.z = p_details->m_pos[Z] - ( screen_right[Z] * p_details->m_test_radius ) - ( screen_up[Z] * p_details->m_test_radius );
2867  verts[0].m_col = 0xFFFFFFFF;
2868 
2869  verts[1].m_pos.x = p_details->m_pos[X] - ( screen_right[X] * p_details->m_test_radius ) + ( screen_up[X] * p_details->m_test_radius );
2870  verts[1].m_pos.y = p_details->m_pos[Y] - ( screen_right[Y] * p_details->m_test_radius ) + ( screen_up[Y] * p_details->m_test_radius );
2871  verts[1].m_pos.z = p_details->m_pos[Z] - ( screen_right[Z] * p_details->m_test_radius ) + ( screen_up[Z] * p_details->m_test_radius );
2872  verts[1].m_col = 0xFFFFFFFF;
2873 
2874  verts[2].m_pos.x = p_details->m_pos[X] + ( screen_right[X] * p_details->m_test_radius ) + ( screen_up[X] * p_details->m_test_radius );
2875  verts[2].m_pos.y = p_details->m_pos[Y] + ( screen_right[Y] * p_details->m_test_radius ) + ( screen_up[Y] * p_details->m_test_radius );
2876  verts[2].m_pos.z = p_details->m_pos[Z] + ( screen_right[Z] * p_details->m_test_radius ) + ( screen_up[Z] * p_details->m_test_radius );
2877  verts[2].m_col = 0xFFFFFFFF;
2878 
2879  verts[3].m_pos.x = p_details->m_pos[X] + ( screen_right[X] * p_details->m_test_radius ) - ( screen_up[X] * p_details->m_test_radius );
2880  verts[3].m_pos.y = p_details->m_pos[Y] + ( screen_right[Y] * p_details->m_test_radius ) - ( screen_up[Y] * p_details->m_test_radius );
2881  verts[3].m_pos.z = p_details->m_pos[Z] + ( screen_right[Z] * p_details->m_test_radius ) - ( screen_up[Z] * p_details->m_test_radius );
2882  verts[3].m_col = 0xFFFFFFFF;
2883 
2884  D3DDevice_DrawVerticesUP( D3DPT_QUADLIST, 4, verts, sizeof( sLightGlowVert ));
2885 
2886  // Push a visibility check onto the queue.
2887  D3DDevice_EndVisibilityTest( index );
2888  }
2889 
2890  p_details = sLightGlowDetailsTable.IterateNext();
2891  }
2892 
2893  // Restore z and color writes.
2894  D3DDevice_SetRenderState( D3DRS_COLORWRITEENABLE, D3DCOLORWRITEENABLE_ALL );
2895  D3DDevice_SetRenderState( D3DRS_ZWRITEENABLE, TRUE );
2896  }
2897  else
2898  {
2899  set_blend_mode( vBLEND_MODE_BLEND );
2900  set_pixel_shader( PixelShader5 );
2901  set_vertex_shader( D3DFVF_XYZ | D3DFVF_DIFFUSE );
2902 
2903  while( p_details )
2904  {
2905  // Get the visibility check result.
2906  uint32 result = p_details->m_visibility_test_fifo.GetStatus();
2907 
2908  if( result > 0 )
2909  {
2910  // Tend the radius towards the target.
2911  p_details->m_current_radius += ( p_details->m_glow_radius - p_details->m_current_radius ) * p_details->m_radius_growth;
2912  }
2913  else
2914  {
2915  // Tend the radius towards zero.
2916  p_details->m_current_radius -= p_details->m_current_radius * p_details->m_radius_growth;
2917  }
2918 
2919  if( p_details->
2920  m_current_radius > 0.0f )
2921  {
2922  // Draw the glow.
2923  verts[0].m_pos.x = p_details->m_pos[X] - ( screen_right[X] * p_details->m_current_radius ) - ( screen_up[X] * p_details->m_current_radius );
2924  verts[0].m_pos.y = p_details->m_pos[Y] - ( screen_right[Y] * p_details->m_current_radius ) - ( screen_up[Y] * p_details->m_current_radius );
2925  verts[0].m_pos.z = p_details->m_pos[Z] - ( screen_right[Z] * p_details->m_current_radius ) - ( screen_up[Z] * p_details->m_current_radius );
2926  verts[0].m_col = 0x40FFFFFF;
2927 
2928  verts[1].m_pos.x = p_details->m_pos[X] - ( screen_right[X] * p_details->m_current_radius ) + ( screen_up[X] * p_details->m_current_radius );
2929  verts[1].m_pos.y = p_details->m_pos[Y] - ( screen_right[Y] * p_details->m_current_radius ) + ( screen_up[Y] * p_details->m_current_radius );
2930  verts[1].m_pos.z = p_details->m_pos[Z] - ( screen_right[Z] * p_details->m_current_radius ) + ( screen_up[Z] * p_details->m_current_radius );
2931  verts[1].m_col = 0x40FFFFFF;
2932 
2933  verts[2].m_pos.x = p_details->m_pos[X] + ( screen_right[X] * p_details->m_current_radius ) + ( screen_up[X] * p_details->m_current_radius );
2934  verts[2].m_pos.y = p_details->m_pos[Y] + ( screen_right[Y] * p_details->m_current_radius ) + ( screen_up[Y] * p_details->m_current_radius );
2935  verts[2].m_pos.z = p_details->m_pos[Z] + ( screen_right[Z] * p_details->m_current_radius ) + ( screen_up[Z] * p_details->m_current_radius );
2936  verts[2].m_col = 0x40FFFFFF;
2937 
2938  verts[3].m_pos.x = p_details->m_pos[X] + ( screen_right[X] * p_details->m_current_radius ) - ( screen_up[X] * p_details->m_current_radius );
2939  verts[3].m_pos.y = p_details->m_pos[Y] + ( screen_right[Y] * p_details->m_current_radius ) - ( screen_up[Y] * p_details->m_current_radius );
2940  verts[3].m_pos.z = p_details->m_pos[Z] + ( screen_right[Z] * p_details->m_current_radius ) - ( screen_up[Z] * p_details->m_current_radius );
2941  verts[3].m_col = 0x40FFFFFF;
2942 
2943  D3DDevice_DrawVerticesUP( D3DPT_QUADLIST, 4, verts, sizeof( sLightGlowVert ));
2944  }
2945 
2946  p_details = sLightGlowDetailsTable.IterateNext();
2947  }
2948  }
2949 }

Перекрестные ссылки NxXbox::sVisibilityTestFIFO::AddStatus(), Mth::CrossProduct(), EngineGlobals, NxXbox::sVisibilityTestFIFO::GetStatus(), NxXbox::sLightGlowDetails::m_current_radius, NxXbox::sLightGlowDetails::m_glow_radius, NxXbox::sLightGlowDetails::m_pos, NxXbox::sLightGlowDetails::m_radius_growth, NxXbox::sLightGlowDetails::m_test_radius, NxXbox::sLightGlowDetails::m_visibility_test_fifo, Mth::Vector::Normalize(), PixelShader5, set_blend_mode(), set_pixel_shader(), set_texture(), set_vertex_shader(), sLightGlowDetailsTable, vBLEND_MODE_BLEND, vBLEND_MODE_DIFFUSE, X, Y и Z.

Граф вызовов:

◆ sort_by_material_draw_order()

int NxXbox::sort_by_material_draw_order ( const void *  p1,
const void *  p2 
)

См. определение в файле scene.cpp строка 17

18 {
19  sMesh *p_mesh1 = *((sMesh**)p1 );
20  sMesh *p_mesh2 = *((sMesh**)p2 );
21  sMaterial *p_material1 = p_mesh1->mp_material;
22  sMaterial *p_material2 = p_mesh2->mp_material;
23 
24  Dbg_Assert( p_material1 != NULL );
25  Dbg_Assert( p_material2 != NULL );
26 
27  if( p_material1->m_draw_order == p_material2->m_draw_order )
28  {
29  // Have to do some special case processing for the situation where two or more meshes have the same draw order, but only some are
30  // marked as being dynamically sorted. In such a situation the non dynamically sorted ones should come first.
31  if( p_material1->m_sorted == p_material2->m_sorted )
32  {
33  if( p_material1 == p_material2 )
34  {
35  // Same material, no further sorting required.
36  return 0;
37  }
38  else
39  {
40  // If the pixel shaders are the same, sort by material address, otherwise sort by pixel shader value.
41  if( p_mesh1->m_pixel_shader == p_mesh2->m_pixel_shader )
42  {
43  return ((uint32)p_material1 > (uint32)p_material2 ) ? 1 : -1;
44  }
45  else
46  {
47  return ((uint32)p_mesh1->m_pixel_shader > (uint32)p_mesh2->m_pixel_shader ) ? 1 : -1;
48  }
49  }
50  }
51  else if( p_material1->m_sorted )
52  {
53  return 1;
54  }
55  return -1;
56  }
57  return ( p_material1->m_draw_order > p_material2->m_draw_order ) ? 1 : -1;
58 }

Перекрестные ссылки NxXbox::sMaterial::m_draw_order, NxXbox::sMesh::m_pixel_shader, NxXbox::sMaterial::m_sorted, NxXbox::sMesh::mp_material, p1 и p2.

Используется в Nx::CXboxImposterGroup::plat_create_imposter_polygon() и NxXbox::sScene::SortMeshes().

◆ DeleteScene()

void NxXbox::DeleteScene ( sScene *  pScene)

См. определение в файле scene.cpp строка 468

469 {
470  // Iterate through the table of materials, deleting them.
471  if( pScene->pMaterialTable )
472  {
473  pScene->pMaterialTable->IterateStart();
474  sMaterial* p_mat = pScene->pMaterialTable->IterateNext();
475  while( p_mat )
476  {
477  delete p_mat;
478  p_mat = pScene->pMaterialTable->IterateNext();
479  }
480  }
481 
482  // Delete the scene itself.
483  delete pScene;
484 }
